GV01rv_hn06u:2: RV_6,001.01a tvaṃ hy agne prathamo manotāsyā dhiyo abhavo dasma hotā |
GV01rv_hn06u:3: RV_6,001.01c tvaṃ sīṃ vṛṣann akṛṇor duṣṭarītu saho viśvasmai sahase sahadhyai ||
GV01rv_hn06u:4: RV_6,001.02a adhā hotā ny asīdo yajīyān iḷas pada iṣayann īḍyaḥ san |
GV01rv_hn06u:5: RV_6,001.02c taṃ tvā naraḥ prathamaṃ devayanto maho rāye citayanto anu gman ||
GV01rv_hn06u:6: RV_6,001.03a vṛteva yantam bahubhir vasavyais tve rayiṃ jāgṛvāṃso anu gman |
GV01rv_hn06u:7: RV_6,001.03c ruśantam agniṃ darśatam bṛhantaṃ vapāvantaṃ viśvahā dīdivāṃsam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:8: RV_6,001.04a padaṃ devasya namasā vyantaḥ śravasyavaḥ śrava āpann amṛktam |
GV01rv_hn06u:9: RV_6,001.04c nāmāni cid dadhire yajñiyāni bhadrāyāṃ te raṇayanta saṃdṛṣṭau ||
GV01rv_hn06u:10: RV_6,001.05a tvāṃ vardhanti kṣitayaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tvāṃ rāya ubhayāso janānām |
GV01rv_hn06u:11: RV_6,001.05c tvaṃ trātā taraṇe cetyo bhūḥ pitā mātā sadam in mānuṣāṇām ||
GV01rv_hn06u:12: RV_6,001.06a saparyeṇyaḥ sa priyo vikṣv agnir hotā mandro ni ṣasādā yajīyān |
GV01rv_hn06u:13: RV_6,001.06c taṃ tvā vayaṃ dama ā dīdivāṃsam upa jñubādho namasā sadema ||
GV01rv_hn06u:14: RV_6,001.07a taṃ tvā vayaṃ sudhyo navyam agne sumnāyava īmahe devayantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:15: RV_6,001.07c tvaṃ viśo anayo dīdyāno divo agne bṛhatā rocanena ||
GV01rv_hn06u:16: RV_6,001.08a viśāṃ kaviṃ viśpatiṃ śaśvatīnāṃ nitośanaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ carṣaṇīnām |
GV01rv_hn06u:17: RV_6,001.08c pretīṣaṇim iṣayantam pāvakaṃ rājantam agniṃ yajataṃ rayīṇām ||
GV01rv_hn06u:18: RV_6,001.09a so agna īje śaśame ca marto yas ta ānaṭ samidhā havyadātim |
GV01rv_hn06u:19: RV_6,001.09c ya āhutim pari vedā namobhir viśvet sa vāmā dadhate tvotaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:20: RV_6,001.10a asmā u te mahi mahe vidhema namobhir agne samidhota havyaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:21: RV_6,001.10c vedī sūno sahaso gīrbhir ukthair ā te bhadrāyāṃ sumatau yatema ||
GV01rv_hn06u:22: RV_6,001.11a ā yas tatantha rodasī vi bhāsā śravobhiś ca śravasyas tarutraḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:23: RV_6,001.11c bṛhadbhir vājai sthavirebhir asme revadbhir agne vitaraṃ vi bhāhi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:24: RV_6,001.12a nṛvad vaso sadam id dhehy asme bhūri tokāya tanayāya paśvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:25: RV_6,001.12c pūrvīr iṣo bṛhatīr āre-aghā asme bhadrā sauśravasāni santu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:26: RV_6,001.13a purūṇy agne purudhā tvāyā vasūni rājan vasutā te aśyām |
GV01rv_hn06u:27: RV_6,001.13c purūṇi hi tve puruvāra santy agne vasu vidhate rājani tve ||
GV01rv_hn06u:28: RV_6,002.01a tvaṃ hi kṣaitavad yaśo 'gne mitro na patyase |
GV01rv_hn06u:29: RV_6,002.01c tvaṃ vicarṣaṇe śravo vaso puṣṭiṃ na puṣyasi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:30: RV_6,002.02a tvāṃ hi ṣmā carṣaṇayo yajñebhir gīrbhir īḷate |
GV01rv_hn06u:31: RV_6,002.02c tvāṃ vājī yāty avṛko rajastūr viśvacarṣaṇiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:32: RV_6,002.03a sajoṣas tvā divo naro yajñasya ketum indhate |
GV01rv_hn06u:33: RV_6,002.03c yad dha sya mānuṣo janaḥ sumnāyur juhve adhvare ||
GV01rv_hn06u:34: RV_6,002.04a ṛdhad yas te sudānave dhiyā martaḥ śaśamate |
GV01rv_hn06u:35: RV_6,002.04c ūtī ṣa bṛhato divo dviṣo aṃho na tarati ||
GV01rv_hn06u:36: RV_6,002.05a samidhā yas ta āhutiṃ niśitim martyo naśat |
GV01rv_hn06u:37: RV_6,002.05c vayāvantaṃ sa puṣyati kṣayam agne śatāyuṣam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:38: RV_6,002.06a tveṣas te dhūma ṛṇvati divi ṣañ chukra ātataḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:39: RV_6,002.06c sūro na hi dyutā tvaṃ kṛpā pāvaka rocase ||
GV01rv_hn06u:40: RV_6,002.07a adhā hi vikṣv īḍyo 'si priyo no atithiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:41: RV_6,002.07c raṇvaḥ purīva jūryaḥ sūnur na trayayāyyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:42: RV_6,002.08a kratvā hi droṇe ajyase 'gne vājī na kṛtvyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:43: RV_6,002.08c parijmeva svadhā gayo 'tyo na hvāryaḥ śiśuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:44: RV_6,002.09a tvaṃ tyā cid acyutāgne paśur na yavase |
GV01rv_hn06u:45: RV_6,002.09c dhāmā ha yat te ajara vanā vṛścanti śikvasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:46: RV_6,002.10a veṣi hy adhvarīyatām agne hotā dame viśām |
GV01rv_hn06u:47: RV_6,002.10c samṛdho viśpate kṛṇu juṣasva havyam aṅgiraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:48: RV_6,002.11a acchā no mitramaho deva devān agne vocaḥ sumatiṃ rodasyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:49: RV_6,002.11c vīhi svastiṃ sukṣitiṃ divo nṝn dviṣo aṃhāṃsi duritā tarema tā tarema tavāvasā tarema ||
GV01rv_hn06u:50: RV_6,003.01a agne sa kṣeṣad ṛtapā ṛtejā uru jyotir naśate devayuṣ ṭe |
GV01rv_hn06u:51: RV_6,003.01c yaṃ tvam mitreṇa varuṇaḥ sajoṣā deva pāsi tyajasā martam aṃhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:52: RV_6,003.02a īje yajñebhiḥ śaśame śamībhir ṛdhadvārāyāgnaye dadāśa |
GV01rv_hn06u:53: RV_6,003.02c evā cana taṃ yaśasām ajuṣṭir nāṃho martaṃ naśate na pradṛptiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:54: RV_6,003.03a sūro na yasya dṛśatir arepā bhīmā yad eti śucatas ta ā dhīḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:55: RV_6,003.03c heṣasvataḥ śurudho nāyam aktoḥ kutrā cid raṇvo vasatir vanejāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:56: RV_6,003.04a tigmaṃ cid ema mahi varpo asya bhasad aśvo na yamasāna āsā |
GV01rv_hn06u:57: RV_6,003.04c vijehamānaḥ paraśur na jihvāṃ dravir na drāvayati dāru dhakṣat ||
GV01rv_hn06u:58: RV_6,003.05a sa id asteva prati dhād asiṣyañ chiśīta tejo 'yaso na dhārām |
GV01rv_hn06u:59: RV_6,003.05c citradhrajatir aratir yo aktor ver na druṣadvā raghupatmajaṃhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:60: RV_6,003.06a sa īṃ rebho na prati vasta usrāḥ śociṣā rārapīti mitramahāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:61: RV_6,003.06c naktaṃ ya īm aruṣo yo divā nṝn amartyo aruṣo yo divā nṝn ||
GV01rv_hn06u:62: RV_6,003.07a divo na yasya vidhato navīnod vṛṣā rukṣa oṣadhīṣu nūnot |
GV01rv_hn06u:63: RV_6,003.07c ghṛṇā na yo dhrajasā patmanā yann ā rodasī vasunā daṃ supatnī ||
GV01rv_hn06u:64: RV_6,003.08a dhāyobhir vā yo yujyebhir arkair vidyun na davidyot svebhiḥ śuṣmaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:65: RV_6,003.08c śardho vā yo marutāṃ tatakṣa ṛbhur na tveṣo rabhasāno adyaut ||
GV01rv_hn06u:66: RV_6,004.01a yathā hotar manuṣo devatātā yajñebhiḥ sūno sahaso yajāsi |
GV01rv_hn06u:67: RV_6,004.01c evā no adya samanā samānān uśann agna uśato yakṣi devān ||
GV01rv_hn06u:68: RV_6,004.02a sa no vibhāvā cakṣaṇir na vastor agnir vandāru vedyaś cano dhāt |
GV01rv_hn06u:69: RV_6,004.02c viśvāyur yo amṛto martyeṣūṣarbhud bhūd atithir jātavedāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:70: RV_6,004.03a dyāvo na yasya panayanty abhvam bhāsāṃsi vaste sūryo na śukraḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:71: RV_6,004.03c vi ya inoty ajaraḥ pāvako 'śnasya cic chiśnathat pūrvyāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:72: RV_6,004.04a vadmā hi sūno asy admasadvā cakre agnir januṣājmānnam |
GV01rv_hn06u:73: RV_6,004.04c sa tvaṃ na ūrjasana ūrjaṃ dhā rājeva jer avṛke kṣeṣy antaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:74: RV_6,004.05a nitikti yo vāraṇam annam atti vāyur na rāṣṭry aty ety aktūn |
GV01rv_hn06u:75: RV_6,004.05c turyāma yas ta ādiśām arātīr atyo na hrutaḥ patataḥ parihrut ||
GV01rv_hn06u:76: RV_6,004.06a ā sūryo na bhānumadbhir arkair agne tatantha rodasī vi bhāsā |
GV01rv_hn06u:77: RV_6,004.06c citro nayat pari tamāṃsy aktaḥ śociṣā patmann auśijo na dīyan ||
GV01rv_hn06u:78: RV_6,004.07a tvāṃ hi mandratamam arkaśokair vavṛmahe mahi naḥ śroṣy agne |
GV01rv_hn06u:79: RV_6,004.07c indraṃ na tvā śavasā devatā vāyum pṛṇanti rādhasā nṛtamāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:80: RV_6,004.08a nū no agne 'vṛkebhiḥ svasti veṣi rāyaḥ pathibhiḥ parṣy aṃhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:81: RV_6,004.08c tā sūribhyo gṛṇate rāsi sumnam madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:82: RV_6,005.01a huve vaḥ sūnuṃ sahaso yuvānam adroghavācam matibhir yaviṣṭham |
GV01rv_hn06u:83: RV_6,005.01c ya invati draviṇāni pracetā viśvavārāṇi puruvāro adhruk ||
GV01rv_hn06u:84: RV_6,005.02a tve vasūni purvaṇīka hotar doṣā vastor erire yajñiyāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:85: RV_6,005.02c kṣāmeva viśvā bhuvanāni yasmin saṃ saubhagāni dadhire pāvake ||
GV01rv_hn06u:86: RV_6,005.03a tvaṃ vikṣu pradivaḥ sīda āsu kratvā rathīr abhavo vāryāṇām |
GV01rv_hn06u:87: RV_6,005.03c ata inoṣi vidhate cikitvo vy ānuṣag jātavedo vasūni ||
GV01rv_hn06u:88: RV_6,005.04a yo naḥ sanutyo abhidāsad agne yo antaro mitramaho vanuṣyāt |
GV01rv_hn06u:89: RV_6,005.04c tam ajarebhir vṛṣabhis tava svais tapā tapiṣṭha tapasā tapasvān ||
GV01rv_hn06u:90: RV_6,005.05a yas te yajñena samidhā ya ukthair arkebhiḥ sūno sahaso dadāśat |
GV01rv_hn06u:91: RV_6,005.05c sa martyeṣv amṛta pracetā rāyā dyumnena śravasā vi bhāti ||
GV01rv_hn06u:92: RV_6,005.06a sa tat kṛdhīṣitas tūyam agne spṛdho bādhasva sahasā sahasvān |
GV01rv_hn06u:93: RV_6,005.06c yac chasyase dyubhir akto vacobhis taj juṣasva jaritur ghoṣi manma ||
GV01rv_hn06u:94: RV_6,005.07a aśyāma taṃ kāmam agne tavotī aśyāma rayiṃ rayivaḥ suvīram |
GV01rv_hn06u:95: RV_6,005.07c aśyāma vājam abhi vājayanto 'śyāma dyumnam ajarājaraṃ te ||
GV01rv_hn06u:96: RV_6,006.01a pra navyasā sahasaḥ sūnum acchā yajñena gātum ava icchamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:97: RV_6,006.01c vṛścadvanaṃ kṛṣṇayāmaṃ ruśantaṃ vītī hotāraṃ divyaṃ jigāti ||
GV01rv_hn06u:98: RV_6,006.02a sa śvitānas tanyatū rocanasthā ajarebhir nānadadbhir yaviṣṭhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:99: RV_6,006.02c yaḥ pāvakaḥ purutamaḥ purūṇi pṛthūny agnir anuyāti bharvan ||
GV01rv_hn06u:100: RV_6,006.03a vi te viṣvag vātajūtāso agne bhāmāsaḥ śuce śucayaś caranti |
GV01rv_hn06u:101: RV_6,006.03c tuvimrakṣāso divyā navagvā vanā vananti dhṛṣatā rujantaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:102: RV_6,006.04a ye te śukrāsaḥ śucayaḥ śuciṣmaḥ kṣāṃ vapanti viṣitāso aśvāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:103: RV_6,006.04c adha bhramas ta urviyā vi bhāti yātayamāno adhi sānu pṛśneḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:104: RV_6,006.05a adha jihvā pāpatīti pra vṛṣṇo goṣuyudho nāśaniḥ sṛjānā |
GV01rv_hn06u:105: RV_6,006.05c śūrasyeva prasitiḥ kṣātir agner durvartur bhīmo dayate vanāni ||
GV01rv_hn06u:106: RV_6,006.06a ā bhānunā pārthivāni jrayāṃsi mahas todasya dhṛṣatā tatantha |
GV01rv_hn06u:107: RV_6,006.06c sa bādhasvāpa bhayā sahobhi spṛdho vanuṣyan vanuṣo ni jūrva ||
GV01rv_hn06u:108: RV_6,006.07a sa citra citraṃ citayantam asme citrakṣatra citratamaṃ vayodhām |
GV01rv_hn06u:109: RV_6,006.07c candraṃ rayim puruvīram bṛhantaṃ candra candrābhir gṛṇate yuvasva ||
GV01rv_hn06u:110: RV_6,007.01a mūrdhānaṃ divo aratim pṛthivyā vaiśvānaram ṛta ā jātam agnim |
GV01rv_hn06u:111: RV_6,007.01c kaviṃ samrājam atithiṃ janānām āsann ā pātraṃ janayanta devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:112: RV_6,007.02a nābhiṃ yajñānāṃ sadanaṃ rayīṇām mahām āhāvam abhi saṃ navanta |
GV01rv_hn06u:113: RV_6,007.02c vaiśvānaraṃ rathyam adhvarāṇāṃ yajñasya ketuṃ janayanta devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:114: RV_6,007.03a tvad vipro jāyate vājy agne tvad vīrāso abhimātiṣāhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:115: RV_6,007.03c vaiśvānara tvam asmāsu dhehi vasūni rājan spṛhayāyyāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:116: RV_6,007.04a tvāṃ viśve amṛta jāyamānaṃ śiśuṃ na devā abhi saṃ navante |
GV01rv_hn06u:117: RV_6,007.04c tava kratubhir amṛtatvam āyan vaiśvānara yat pitror adīdeḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:118: RV_6,007.05a vaiśvānara tava tāni vratāni mahāny agne nakir ā dadharṣa |
GV01rv_hn06u:119: RV_6,007.05c yaj jāyamānaḥ pitror upasthe 'vindaḥ ketuṃ vayuneṣv ahnām ||
GV01rv_hn06u:120: RV_6,007.06a vaiśvānarasya vimitāni cakṣasā sānūni divo amṛtasya ketunā |
GV01rv_hn06u:121: RV_6,007.06c tasyed u viśvā bhuvanādhi mūrdhani vayā iva ruruhuḥ sapta visruhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:122: RV_6,007.07a vi yo rajāṃsy amimīta sukratur vaiśvānaro vi divo rocanā kaviḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:123: RV_6,007.07c pari yo viśvā bhuvanāni paprathe 'dabdho gopā amṛtasya rakṣitā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:124: RV_6,008.01a pṛkṣasya vṛṣṇo aruṣasya nū sahaḥ pra nu vocaṃ vidathā jātavedasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:125: RV_6,008.01c vaiśvānarāya matir navyasī śuciḥ soma iva pavate cārur agnaye ||
GV01rv_hn06u:126: RV_6,008.02a sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyomani vratāny agnir vratapā arakṣata |
GV01rv_hn06u:127: RV_6,008.02c vy antarikṣam amimīta sukratur vaiśvānaro mahinā nākam aspṛśat ||
GV01rv_hn06u:128: RV_6,008.03a vy astabhnād rodasī mitro adbhuto 'ntarvāvad akṛṇoj jyotiṣā tamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:129: RV_6,008.03c vi carmaṇīva dhiṣaṇe avartayad vaiśvānaro viśvam adhatta vṛṣṇyam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:130: RV_6,008.04a apām upasthe mahiṣā agṛbhṇata viśo rājānam upa tasthur ṛgmiyam |
GV01rv_hn06u:131: RV_6,008.04c ā dūto agnim abharad vivasvato vaiśvānaram mātariśvā parāvataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:132: RV_6,008.05a yuge-yuge vidathyaṃ gṛṇadbhyo 'gne rayiṃ yaśasaṃ dhehi navyasīm |
GV01rv_hn06u:133: RV_6,008.05c pavyeva rājann aghaśaṃsam ajara nīcā ni vṛśca vaninaṃ na tejasā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:134: RV_6,008.06a asmākam agne maghavatsu dhārayānāmi kṣatram ajaraṃ suvīryam |
GV01rv_hn06u:135: RV_6,008.06c vayaṃ jayema śatinaṃ sahasriṇaṃ vaiśvānara vājam agne tavotibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:136: RV_6,008.07a adabdhebhis tava gopābhir iṣṭe 'smākam pāhi triṣadhastha sūrīn |
GV01rv_hn06u:137: RV_6,008.07c rakṣā ca no daduṣāṃ śardho agne vaiśvānara pra ca tārī stavānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:138: RV_6,009.01a ahaś ca kṛṣṇam ahar arjunaṃ ca vi vartete rajasī vedyābhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:139: RV_6,009.01c vaiśvānaro jāyamāno na rājāvātiraj jyotiṣāgnis tamāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:140: RV_6,009.02a nāhaṃ tantuṃ na vi jānāmy otuṃ na yaṃ vayanti samare 'tamānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:141: RV_6,009.02c kasya svit putra iha vaktvāni paro vadāty avareṇa pitrā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:142: RV_6,009.03a sa it tantuṃ sa vi jānāty otuṃ sa vaktvāny ṛtuthā vadāti |
GV01rv_hn06u:143: RV_6,009.03c ya īṃ ciketad amṛtasya gopā avaś caran paro anyena paśyan ||
GV01rv_hn06u:144: RV_6,009.04a ayaṃ hotā prathamaḥ paśyatemam idaṃ jyotir amṛtam martyeṣu |
GV01rv_hn06u:145: RV_6,009.04c ayaṃ sa jajñe dhruva ā niṣatto 'martyas tanvā vardhamānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:146: RV_6,009.05a dhruvaṃ jyotir nihitaṃ dṛśaye kam mano javiṣṭham patayatsv antaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:147: RV_6,009.05c viśve devāḥ samanasaḥ saketā ekaṃ kratum abhi vi yanti sādhu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:148: RV_6,009.06a vi me karṇā patayato vi cakṣur vīdaṃ jyotir hṛdaya āhitaṃ yat |
GV01rv_hn06u:149: RV_6,009.06c vi me manaś carati dūraādhīḥ kiṃ svid vakṣyāmi kim u nū maniṣye ||
GV01rv_hn06u:150: RV_6,009.07a viśve devā anamasyan bhiyānās tvām agne tamasi tasthivāṃsam |
GV01rv_hn06u:152: RV_6,010.01a puro vo mandraṃ divyaṃ suvṛktim prayati yajñe agnim adhvare dadhidhvam |
GV01rv_hn06u:153: RV_6,010.01c pura ukthebhiḥ sa hi no vibhāvā svadhvarā karati jātavedāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:154: RV_6,010.02a tam u dyumaḥ purvaṇīka hotar agne agnibhir manuṣa idhānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:155: RV_6,010.02c stomaṃ yam asmai mamateva śūṣaṃ ghṛtaṃ na śuci matayaḥ pavante ||
GV01rv_hn06u:156: RV_6,010.03a pīpāya sa śravasā martyeṣu yo agnaye dadāśa vipra ukthaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:157: RV_6,010.03c citrābhis tam ūtibhiś citraśocir vrajasya sātā gomato dadhāti ||
GV01rv_hn06u:158: RV_6,010.04a ā yaḥ paprau jāyamāna urvī dūredṛśā bhāsā kṛṣṇādhvā |
GV01rv_hn06u:159: RV_6,010.04c adha bahu cit tama ūrmyāyās tiraḥ śociṣā dadṛśe pāvakaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:160: RV_6,010.05a nū naś citram puruvājābhir ūtī agne rayim maghavadbhyaś ca dhehi |
GV01rv_hn06u:161: RV_6,010.05c ye rādhasā śravasā cāty anyān suvīryebhiś cābhi santi janān ||
GV01rv_hn06u:162: RV_6,010.06a imaṃ yajñaṃ cano dhā agna uśan yaṃ ta āsāno juhute haviṣmān |
GV01rv_hn06u:163: RV_6,010.06c bharadvājeṣu dadhiṣe suvṛktim avīr vājasya gadhyasya sātau ||
GV01rv_hn06u:164: RV_6,010.07a vi dveṣāṃsīnuhi vardhayeḷām madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:165: RV_6,011.01a yajasva hotar iṣito yajīyān agne bādho marutāṃ na prayukti |
GV01rv_hn06u:166: RV_6,011.01c ā no mitrāvaruṇā nāsatyā dyāvā hotrāya pṛthivī vavṛtyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:167: RV_6,011.02a tvaṃ hotā mandratamo no adhrug antar devo vidathā martyeṣu |
GV01rv_hn06u:168: RV_6,011.02c pāvakayā juhvā vahnir āsāgne yajasva tanvaṃ tava svām ||
GV01rv_hn06u:169: RV_6,011.03a dhanyā cid dhi tve dhiṣaṇā vaṣṭi pra devāñ janma gṛṇate yajadhyai |
GV01rv_hn06u:170: RV_6,011.03c vepiṣṭho aṅgirasāṃ yad dha vipro madhu cchando bhanati rebha iṣṭau ||
GV01rv_hn06u:171: RV_6,011.04a adidyutat sv apāko vibhāvāgne yajasva rodasī urūcī |
GV01rv_hn06u:172: RV_6,011.04c āyuṃ na yaṃ namasā rātahavyā añjanti suprayasam pañca janāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:173: RV_6,011.05a vṛñje ha yan namasā barhir agnāv ayāmi srug ghṛtavatī suvṛktiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:174: RV_6,011.05c amyakṣi sadma sadane pṛthivyā aśrāyi yajñaḥ sūrye na cakṣuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:175: RV_6,011.06a daśasyā naḥ purvaṇīka hotar devebhir agne agnibhir idhānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:176: RV_6,011.06c rāyaḥ sūno sahaso vāvasānā ati srasema vṛjanaṃ nāṃhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:177: RV_6,012.01a madhye hotā duroṇe barhiṣo rāḷ agnis todasya rodasī yajadhyai |
GV01rv_hn06u:178: RV_6,012.01c ayaṃ sa sūnuḥ sahasa ṛtāvā dūrāt sūryo na śociṣā tatāna ||
GV01rv_hn06u:179: RV_6,012.02a ā yasmin tve sv apāke yajatra yakṣad rājan sarvatāteva nu dyauḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:180: RV_6,012.02c triṣadhasthas tataruṣo na jaṃho havyā maghāni mānuṣā yajadhyai ||
GV01rv_hn06u:181: RV_6,012.03a tejiṣṭhā yasyāratir vanerāṭ todo adhvan na vṛdhasāno adyaut |
GV01rv_hn06u:182: RV_6,012.03c adrogho na dravitā cetati tmann amartyo 'vartra oṣadhīṣu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:183: RV_6,012.04a sāsmākebhir etarī na śūṣair agni ṣṭave dama ā jātavedāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:184: RV_6,012.04c drvanno vanvan kratvā nārvosraḥ piteva jārayāyi yajñaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:185: RV_6,012.05a adha smāsya panayanti bhāso vṛthā yat takṣad anuyāti pṛthvīm |
GV01rv_hn06u:186: RV_6,012.05c sadyo yaḥ syandro viṣito dhavīyān ṛṇo na tāyur ati dhanvā rāṭ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:187: RV_6,012.06a sa tvaṃ no arvan nidāyā viśvebhir agne agnibhir idhānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:188: RV_6,012.06c veṣi rāyo vi yāsi ducchunā madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:189: RV_6,013.01a tvad viśvā subhaga saubhagāny agne vi yanti vanino na vayāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:190: RV_6,013.01c śruṣṭī rayir vājo vṛtratūrye divo vṛṣṭir īḍyo rītir apām ||
GV01rv_hn06u:191: RV_6,013.02a tvam bhago na ā hi ratnam iṣe parijmeva kṣayasi dasmavarcāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:192: RV_6,013.02c agne mitro na bṛhata ṛtasyāsi kṣattā vāmasya deva bhūreḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:193: RV_6,013.03a sa satpatiḥ śavasā hanti vṛtram agne vipro vi paṇer bharti vājam |
GV01rv_hn06u:194: RV_6,013.03c yaṃ tvam praceta ṛtajāta rāyā sajoṣā naptrāpāṃ hinoṣi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:195: RV_6,013.04a yas te sūno sahaso gīrbhir ukthair yajñair marto niśitiṃ vedyānaṭ |
GV01rv_hn06u:196: RV_6,013.04c viśvaṃ sa deva prati vāram agne dhatte dhānyam patyate vasavyaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:197: RV_6,013.05a tā nṛbhya ā sauśravasā suvīrāgne sūno sahasaḥ puṣyase dhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:198: RV_6,013.05c kṛṇoṣi yac chavasā bhūri paśvo vayo vṛkāyāraye jasuraye ||
GV01rv_hn06u:199: RV_6,013.06a vadmā sūno sahaso no vihāyā agne tokaṃ tanayaṃ vāji no dāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:200: RV_6,013.06c viśvābhir gīrbhir abhi pūrtim aśyām madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:201: RV_6,014.01a agnā yo martyo duvo dhiyaṃ jujoṣa dhītibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:202: RV_6,014.01c bhasan nu ṣa pra pūrvya iṣaṃ vurītāvase ||
GV01rv_hn06u:203: RV_6,014.02a agnir id dhi pracetā agnir vedhastama ṛṣiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:204: RV_6,014.02c agniṃ hotāram īḷate yajñeṣu manuṣo viśaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:205: RV_6,014.03a nānā hy agne 'vase spardhante rāyo aryaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:206: RV_6,014.03c tūrvanto dasyum āyavo vrataiḥ sīkṣanto avratam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:207: RV_6,014.04a agnir apsām ṛtīṣahaṃ vīraṃ dadāti satpatim |
GV01rv_hn06u:208: RV_6,014.04c yasya trasanti śavasaḥ saṃcakṣi śatravo bhiyā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:209: RV_6,014.05a agnir hi vidmanā nido devo martam uruṣyati |
GV01rv_hn06u:210: RV_6,014.05c sahāvā yasyāvṛto rayir vājeṣv avṛtaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:211: RV_6,014.06a acchā no mitramaho deva devān agne vocaḥ sumatiṃ rodasyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:212: RV_6,014.06c vīhi svastiṃ sukṣitiṃ divo nṝn dviṣo aṃhāṃsi duritā tarema tā tarema tavāvasā tarema ||
GV01rv_hn06u:213: RV_6,015.01a imam ū ṣu vo atithim uṣarbudhaṃ viśvāsāṃ viśām patim ṛñjase girā |
GV01rv_hn06u:214: RV_6,015.01c vetīd divo januṣā kac cid ā śucir jyok cid atti garbho yad acyutam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:215: RV_6,015.02a mitraṃ na yaṃ sudhitam bhṛgavo dadhur vanaspatāv īḍyam ūrdhvaśociṣam |
GV01rv_hn06u:216: RV_6,015.02c sa tvaṃ suprīto vītahavye adbhuta praśastibhir mahayase dive-dive ||
GV01rv_hn06u:217: RV_6,015.03a sa tvaṃ dakṣasyāvṛko vṛdho bhūr aryaḥ parasyāntarasya taruṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:219: 015.03c rāyaḥ sūno sahaso martyeṣv ā chardir yaccha vītahavyāya sapratho bharadvājāya saprathaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:220: RV_6,015.04a dyutānaṃ vo atithiṃ svarṇaram agniṃ hotāram manuṣaḥ svadhvaram |
GV01rv_hn06u:221: RV_6,015.04c vipraṃ na dyukṣavacasaṃ suvṛktibhir havyavāham aratiṃ devam ṛñjase ||
GV01rv_hn06u:222: RV_6,015.05a pāvakayā yaś citayantyā kṛpā kṣāman ruruca uṣaso na bhānunā |
GV01rv_hn06u:223: RV_6,015.05c tūrvan na yāmann etaśasya nū raṇa ā yo ghṛṇe na tatṛṣāṇo ajaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:224: RV_6,015.06a agnim-agniṃ vaḥ samidhā duvasyata priyam-priyaṃ vo atithiṃ gṛṇīṣaṇi |
GV01rv_hn06u:226: 015.06c upa vo gīrbhir amṛtaṃ vivāsata devo deveṣu vanate hi vāryaṃ devo deveṣu vanate hi no duvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:227: RV_6,015.07a samiddham agniṃ samidhā girā gṛṇe śucim pāvakam puro adhvare dhruvam |
GV01rv_hn06u:228: RV_6,015.07c vipraṃ hotāram puruvāram adruhaṃ kaviṃ sumnair īmahe jātavedasam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:229: RV_6,015.08a tvāṃ dūtam agne amṛtaṃ yuge-yuge havyavāhaṃ dadhire pāyum īḍyam |
GV01rv_hn06u:230: RV_6,015.08c devāsaś ca martāsaś ca jāgṛviṃ vibhuṃ viśpatiṃ namasā ni ṣedire ||
GV01rv_hn06u:231: RV_6,015.09a vibhūṣann agna ubhayāṃ anu vratā dūto devānāṃ rajasī sam īyase |
GV01rv_hn06u:232: RV_6,015.09c yat te dhītiṃ sumatim āvṛṇīmahe 'dha smā nas trivarūthaḥ śivo bhava ||
GV01rv_hn06u:233: RV_6,015.10a taṃ supratīkaṃ sudṛśaṃ svañcam avidvāṃso viduṣṭaraṃ sapema |
GV01rv_hn06u:234: RV_6,015.10c sa yakṣad viśvā vayunāni vidvān pra havyam agnir amṛteṣu vocat ||
GV01rv_hn06u:235: RV_6,015.11a tam agne pāsy uta tam piparṣi yas ta ānaṭ kavaye śūra dhītim |
GV01rv_hn06u:236: RV_6,015.11c yajñasya vā niśitiṃ voditiṃ vā tam it pṛṇakṣi śavasota rāyā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:237: RV_6,015.12a tvam agne vanuṣyato ni pāhi tvam u naḥ sahasāvann avadyāt |
GV01rv_hn06u:238: RV_6,015.12c saṃ tvā dhvasmanvad abhy etu pāthaḥ saṃ rayi spṛhayāyyaḥ sahasrī ||
GV01rv_hn06u:239: RV_6,015.13a agnir hotā gṛhapatiḥ sa rājā viśvā veda janimā jātavedāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:240: RV_6,015.13c devānām uta yo martyānāṃ yajiṣṭhaḥ sa pra yajatām ṛtāvā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:241: RV_6,015.14a agne yad adya viśo adhvarasya hotaḥ pāvakaśoce veṣ ṭvaṃ hi yajvā |
GV01rv_hn06u:242: RV_6,015.14c ṛtā yajāsi mahinā vi yad bhūr havyā vaha yaviṣṭha yā te adya ||
GV01rv_hn06u:243: RV_6,015.15a abhi prayāṃsi sudhitāni hi khyo ni tvā dadhīta rodasī yajadhyai |
GV01rv_hn06u:244: RV_6,015.15c avā no maghavan vājasātāv agne viśvāni duritā tarema tā tarema tavāvasā tarema ||
GV01rv_hn06u:245: RV_6,015.16a agne viśvebhiḥ svanīka devair ūrṇāvantam prathamaḥ sīda yonim |
GV01rv_hn06u:246: RV_6,015.16c kulāyinaṃ ghṛtavantaṃ savitre yajñaṃ naya yajamānāya sādhu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:247: RV_6,015.17a imam u tyam atharvavad agnim manthanti vedhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:248: RV_6,015.17c yam aṅkūyantam ānayann amūraṃ śyāvyābhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:250: RV_6,015.18c ā devān vakṣy amṛtāṃ ṛtāvṛdho yajñaṃ deveṣu pispṛśaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:251: RV_6,015.19a vayam u tvā gṛhapate janānām agne akarma samidhā bṛhantam |
GV01rv_hn06u:252: RV_6,015.19c asthūri no gārhapatyāni santu tigmena nas tejasā saṃ śiśādhi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:253: RV_6,016.01a tvam agne yajñānāṃ hotā viśveṣāṃ hitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:255: RV_6,016.02a sa no mandrābhir adhvare jihvābhir yajā mahaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:256: RV_6,016.02c ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca ||
GV01rv_hn06u:257: RV_6,016.03a vetthā hi vedho adhvanaḥ pathaś ca devāñjasā |
GV01rv_hn06u:259: RV_6,016.04a tvām īḷe adha dvitā bharato vājibhiḥ śunam |
GV01rv_hn06u:261: RV_6,016.05a tvam imā vāryā puru divodāsāya sunvate |
GV01rv_hn06u:263: RV_6,016.06a tvaṃ dūto amartya ā vahā daivyaṃ janam |
GV01rv_hn06u:265: RV_6,016.07a tvām agne svādhyo martāso devavītaye |
GV01rv_hn06u:267: RV_6,016.08a tava pra yakṣi saṃdṛśam uta kratuṃ sudānavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:269: RV_6,016.09a tvaṃ hotā manurhito vahnir āsā viduṣṭaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:271: RV_6,016.10a agna ā yāhi vītaye gṛṇāno havyadātaye |
GV01rv_hn06u:273: RV_6,016.11a taṃ tvā samidbhir aṅgiro ghṛtena vardhayāmasi |
GV01rv_hn06u:275: RV_6,016.12a sa naḥ pṛthu śravāyyam acchā deva vivāsasi |
GV01rv_hn06u:277: RV_6,016.13a tvām agne puṣkarād adhy atharvā nir amanthata |
GV01rv_hn06u:279: RV_6,016.14a tam u tvā dadhyaṅṅ ṛṣiḥ putra īdhe atharvaṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:281: RV_6,016.15a tam u tvā pāthyo vṛṣā sam īdhe dasyuhantamam |
GV01rv_hn06u:283: RV_6,016.16a ehy ū ṣu bravāṇi te 'gna itthetarā giraḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:285: RV_6,016.17a yatra kva ca te mano dakṣaṃ dadhasa uttaram |
GV01rv_hn06u:287: RV_6,016.18a nahi te pūrtam akṣipad bhuvan nemānāṃ vaso |
GV01rv_hn06u:289: RV_6,016.19a āgnir agāmi bhārato vṛtrahā purucetanaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:291: RV_6,016.20a sa hi viśvāti pārthivā rayiṃ dāśan mahitvanā |
GV01rv_hn06u:293: RV_6,016.21a sa pratnavan navīyasāgne dyumnena saṃyatā |
GV01rv_hn06u:295: RV_6,016.22a pra vaḥ sakhāyo agnaye stomaṃ yajñaṃ ca dhṛṣṇuyā |
GV01rv_hn06u:297: RV_6,016.23a sa hi yo mānuṣā yugā sīdad dhotā kavikratuḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:299: RV_6,016.24a tā rājānā śucivratādityān mārutaṃ gaṇam |
GV01rv_hn06u:301: RV_6,016.25a vasvī te agne saṃdṛṣṭir iṣayate martyāya |
GV01rv_hn06u:303: RV_6,016.26a kratvā dā astu śreṣṭho 'dya tvā vanvan surekṇāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:305: RV_6,016.27a te te agne tvotā iṣayanto viśvam āyuḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:306: RV_6,016.27c taranto aryo arātīr vanvanto aryo arātīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:307: RV_6,016.28a agnis tigmena śociṣā yāsad viśvaṃ ny atriṇam |
GV01rv_hn06u:309: RV_6,016.29a suvīraṃ rayim ā bhara jātavedo vicarṣaṇe |
GV01rv_hn06u:311: RV_6,016.30a tvaṃ naḥ pāhy aṃhaso jātavedo aghāyataḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:313: RV_6,016.31a yo no agne dureva ā marto vadhāya dāśati |
GV01rv_hn06u:315: RV_6,016.32a tvaṃ taṃ deva jihvayā pari bādhasva duṣkṛtam |
GV01rv_hn06u:317: RV_6,016.33a bharadvājāya saprathaḥ śarma yaccha sahantya |
GV01rv_hn06u:319: RV_6,016.34a agnir vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanad draviṇasyur vipanyayā |
GV01rv_hn06u:321: RV_6,016.35a garbhe mātuḥ pituṣ pitā vididyutāno akṣare |
GV01rv_hn06u:323: RV_6,016.36a brahma prajāvad ā bhara jātavedo vicarṣaṇe |
GV01rv_hn06u:325: RV_6,016.37a upa tvā raṇvasaṃdṛśam prayasvantaḥ sahaskṛta |
GV01rv_hn06u:327: RV_6,016.38a upa cchāyām iva ghṛṇer aganma śarma te vayam |
GV01rv_hn06u:329: RV_6,016.39a ya ugra iva śaryahā tigmaśṛṅgo na vaṃsagaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:331: RV_6,016.40a ā yaṃ haste na khādinaṃ śiśuṃ jātaṃ na bibhrati |
GV01rv_hn06u:333: RV_6,016.41a pra devaṃ devavītaye bharatā vasuvittamam |
GV01rv_hn06u:334: RV_6,016.41c ā sve yonau ni ṣīdatu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:335: RV_6,016.42a ā jātaṃ jātavedasi priyaṃ śiśītātithim |
GV01rv_hn06u:337: RV_6,016.43a agne yukṣvā hi ye tavāśvāso deva sādhavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:339: RV_6,016.44a acchā no yāhy ā vahābhi prayāṃsi vītaye |
GV01rv_hn06u:341: RV_6,016.45a ud agne bhārata dyumad ajasreṇa davidyutat |
GV01rv_hn06u:343: RV_6,016.46a vītī yo devam marto duvasyed agnim īḷītādhvare haviṣmān |
GV01rv_hn06u:344: RV_6,016.46c hotāraṃ satyayajaṃ rodasyor uttānahasto namasā vivāset ||
GV01rv_hn06u:345: RV_6,016.47a ā te agna ṛcā havir hṛdā taṣṭam bharāmasi |
GV01rv_hn06u:346: RV_6,016.47c te te bhavantūkṣaṇa ṛṣabhāso vaśā uta ||
GV01rv_hn06u:347: RV_6,016.48a agniṃ devāso agriyam indhate vṛtrahantamam |
GV01rv_hn06u:348: RV_6,016.48c yenā vasūny ābhṛtā tṛḷhā rakṣāṃsi vājinā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:349: RV_6,017.01a pibā somam abhi yam ugra tarda ūrvaṃ gavyam mahi gṛṇāna indra |
GV01rv_hn06u:350: RV_6,017.01c vi yo dhṛṣṇo vadhiṣo vajrahasta viśvā vṛtram amitriyā śavobhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:351: RV_6,017.02a sa īm pāhi ya ṛjīṣī tarutro yaḥ śipravān vṛṣabho yo matīnām |
GV01rv_hn06u:352: RV_6,017.02c yo gotrabhid vajrabhṛd yo hariṣṭhāḥ sa indra citrāṃ abhi tṛndhi vājān ||
GV01rv_hn06u:353: RV_6,017.03a evā pāhi pratnathā mandatu tvā śrudhi brahma vāvṛdhasvota gīrbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:354: RV_6,017.03c āviḥ sūryaṃ kṛṇuhi pīpihīṣo jahi śatrūṃr abhi gā indra tṛndhi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:355: RV_6,017.04a te tvā madā bṛhad indra svadhāva ime pītā ukṣayanta dyumantam |
GV01rv_hn06u:356: RV_6,017.04c mahām anūnaṃ tavasaṃ vibhūtim matsarāso jarhṛṣanta prasāham ||
GV01rv_hn06u:357: RV_6,017.05a yebhiḥ sūryam uṣasam mandasāno 'vāsayo 'pa dṛḷhāni dardrat |
GV01rv_hn06u:358: RV_6,017.05c mahām adrim pari gā indra santaṃ nutthā acyutaṃ sadasas pari svāt ||
GV01rv_hn06u:359: RV_6,017.06a tava kratvā tava tad daṃsanābhir āmāsu pakvaṃ śacyā ni dīdhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:360: RV_6,017.06c aurṇor dura usriyābhyo vi dṛḷhod ūrvād gā asṛjo aṅgirasvān ||
GV01rv_hn06u:361: RV_6,017.07a paprātha kṣām mahi daṃso vy urvīm upa dyām ṛṣvo bṛhad indra stabhāyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:362: RV_6,017.07c adhārayo rodasī devaputre pratne mātarā yahvī ṛtasya ||
GV01rv_hn06u:363: RV_6,017.08a adha tvā viśve pura indra devā ekaṃ tavasaṃ dadhire bharāya |
GV01rv_hn06u:364: RV_6,017.08c adevo yad abhy auhiṣṭa devān svarṣātā vṛṇata indram atra ||
GV01rv_hn06u:365: RV_6,017.09a adha dyauś cit te apa sā nu vajrād dvitānamad bhiyasā svasya manyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:366: RV_6,017.09c ahiṃ yad indro abhy ohasānaṃ ni cid viśvāyuḥ śayathe jaghāna ||
GV01rv_hn06u:367: RV_6,017.10a adha tvaṣṭā te maha ugra vajraṃ sahasrabhṛṣṭiṃ vavṛtac chatāśrim |
GV01rv_hn06u:368: RV_6,017.10c nikāmam aramaṇasaṃ yena navantam ahiṃ sam piṇag ṛjīṣin ||
GV01rv_hn06u:369: RV_6,017.11a vardhān yaṃ viśve marutaḥ sajoṣāḥ pacac chatam mahiṣāṃ indra tubhyam |
GV01rv_hn06u:370: RV_6,017.11c pūṣā viṣṇus trīṇi sarāṃsi dhāvan vṛtrahaṇam madiram aṃśum asmai ||
GV01rv_hn06u:371: RV_6,017.12a ā kṣodo mahi vṛtaṃ nadīnām pariṣṭhitam asṛja ūrmim apām |
GV01rv_hn06u:372: RV_6,017.12c tāsām anu pravata indra panthām prārdayo nīcīr apasaḥ samudram ||
GV01rv_hn06u:373: RV_6,017.13a evā tā viśvā cakṛvāṃsam indram mahām ugram ajuryaṃ sahodām |
GV01rv_hn06u:374: RV_6,017.13c suvīraṃ tvā svāyudhaṃ suvajram ā brahma navyam avase vavṛtyāt ||
GV01rv_hn06u:375: RV_6,017.14a sa no vājāya śravasa iṣe ca rāye dhehi dyumata indra viprān |
GV01rv_hn06u:376: RV_6,017.14c bharadvāje nṛvata indra sūrīn divi ca smaidhi pārye na indra ||
GV01rv_hn06u:377: RV_6,017.15a ayā vājaṃ devahitaṃ sanema madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:378: RV_6,018.01a tam u ṣṭuhi yo abhibhūtyojā vanvann avātaḥ puruhūta indraḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:379: RV_6,018.01c aṣāḷham ugraṃ sahamānam ābhir gīrbhir vardha vṛṣabhaṃ carṣaṇīnām ||
GV01rv_hn06u:380: RV_6,018.02a sa yudhmaḥ satvā khajakṛt samadvā tuvimrakṣo nadanumāṃ ṛjīṣī |
GV01rv_hn06u:381: RV_6,018.02c bṛhadreṇuś cyavano mānuṣīṇām ekaḥ kṛṣṭīnām abhavat sahāvā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:382: RV_6,018.03a tvaṃ ha nu tyad adamāyo dasyūṃr ekaḥ kṛṣṭīr avanor āryāya |
GV01rv_hn06u:383: RV_6,018.03c asti svin nu vīryaṃ tat ta indra na svid asti tad ṛtuthā vi vocaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:384: RV_6,018.04a sad id dhi te tuvijātasya manye sahaḥ sahiṣṭha turatas turasya |
GV01rv_hn06u:385: RV_6,018.04c ugram ugrasya tavasas tavīyo 'radhrasya radhraturo babhūva ||
GV01rv_hn06u:386: RV_6,018.05a tan naḥ pratnaṃ sakhyam astu yuṣme itthā vadadbhir valam aṅgirobhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:387: RV_6,018.05c hann acyutacyud dasmeṣayantam ṛṇoḥ puro vi duro asya viśvāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:388: RV_6,018.06a sa hi dhībhir havyo asty ugra īśānakṛn mahati vṛtratūrye |
GV01rv_hn06u:389: RV_6,018.06c sa tokasātā tanaye sa vajrī vitantasāyyo abhavat samatsu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:390: RV_6,018.07a sa majmanā janima mānuṣāṇām amartyena nāmnāti pra sarsre |
GV01rv_hn06u:391: RV_6,018.07c sa dyumnena sa śavasota rāyā sa vīryeṇa nṛtamaḥ samokāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:392: RV_6,018.08a sa yo na muhe na mithū jano bhūt sumantunāmā cumuriṃ dhuniṃ ca |
GV01rv_hn06u:393: RV_6,018.08c vṛṇak pipruṃ śambaraṃ śuṣṇam indraḥ purāṃ cyautnāya śayathāya nū cit ||
GV01rv_hn06u:394: RV_6,018.09a udāvatā tvakṣasā panyasā ca vṛtrahatyāya ratham indra tiṣṭha |
GV01rv_hn06u:395: RV_6,018.09c dhiṣva vajraṃ hasta ā dakṣiṇatrābhi pra manda purudatra māyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:396: RV_6,018.10a agnir na śuṣkaṃ vanam indra hetī rakṣo ni dhakṣy aśanir na bhīmā |
GV01rv_hn06u:397: RV_6,018.10c gambhīraya ṛṣvayā yo rurojādhvānayad duritā dambhayac ca ||
GV01rv_hn06u:398: RV_6,018.11a ā sahasram pathibhir indra rāyā tuvidyumna tuvivājebhir arvāk |
GV01rv_hn06u:399: RV_6,018.11c yāhi sūno sahaso yasya nū cid adeva īśe puruhūta yotoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:400: RV_6,018.12a pra tuvidyumnasya sthavirasya ghṛṣver divo rarapśe mahimā pṛthivyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:401: RV_6,018.12c nāsya śatrur na pratimānam asti na pratiṣṭhiḥ purumāyasya sahyoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:402: RV_6,018.13a pra tat te adyā karaṇaṃ kṛtam bhūt kutsaṃ yad āyum atithigvam asmai |
GV01rv_hn06u:403: RV_6,018.13c purū sahasrā ni śiśā abhi kṣām ut tūrvayāṇaṃ dhṛṣatā ninetha ||
GV01rv_hn06u:404: RV_6,018.14a anu tvāhighne adha deva devā madan viśve kavitamaṃ kavīnām |
GV01rv_hn06u:405: RV_6,018.14c karo yatra varivo bādhitāya dive janāya tanve gṛṇānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:406: RV_6,018.15a anu dyāvāpṛthivī tat ta ojo 'martyā jihata indra devāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:407: RV_6,018.15c kṛṣvā kṛtno akṛtaṃ yat te asty ukthaṃ navīyo janayasva yajñaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:408: RV_6,019.01a mahāṃ indro nṛvad ā carṣaṇiprā uta dvibarhā aminaḥ sahobhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:409: RV_6,019.01c asmadryag vāvṛdhe vīryāyoruḥ pṛthuḥ sukṛtaḥ kartṛbhir bhūt ||
GV01rv_hn06u:410: RV_6,019.02a indram eva dhiṣaṇā sātaye dhād bṛhantam ṛṣvam ajaraṃ yuvānam |
GV01rv_hn06u:411: RV_6,019.02c aṣāḷhena śavasā śūśuvāṃsaṃ sadyaś cid yo vāvṛdhe asāmi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:412: RV_6,019.03a pṛthū karasnā bahulā gabhastī asmadryak sam mimīhi śravāṃsi |
GV01rv_hn06u:413: RV_6,019.03c yūtheva paśvaḥ paśupā damūnā asmāṃ indrābhy ā vavṛtsvājau ||
GV01rv_hn06u:414: RV_6,019.04a taṃ va indraṃ catinam asya śākair iha nūnaṃ vājayanto huvema |
GV01rv_hn06u:415: RV_6,019.04c yathā cit pūrve jaritāra āsur anedyā anavadyā ariṣṭāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:416: RV_6,019.05a dhṛtavrato dhanadāḥ somavṛddhaḥ sa hi vāmasya vasunaḥ purukṣuḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:417: RV_6,019.05c saṃ jagmire pathyā rāyo asmin samudre na sindhavo yādamānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:418: RV_6,019.06a śaviṣṭhaṃ na ā bhara śūra śava ojiṣṭham ojo abhibhūta ugram |
GV01rv_hn06u:419: RV_6,019.06c viśvā dyumnā vṛṣṇyā mānuṣāṇām asmabhyaṃ dā harivo mādayadhyai ||
GV01rv_hn06u:420: RV_6,019.07a yas te madaḥ pṛtanāṣāḷ amṛdhra indra taṃ na ā bhara śūśuvāṃsam |
GV01rv_hn06u:421: RV_6,019.07c yena tokasya tanayasya sātau maṃsīmahi jigīvāṃsas tvotāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:422: RV_6,019.08a ā no bhara vṛṣaṇaṃ śuṣmam indra dhanaspṛtaṃ śūśuvāṃsaṃ sudakṣam |
GV01rv_hn06u:423: RV_6,019.08c yena vaṃsāma pṛtanāsu śatrūn tavotibhir uta jāmīṃr ajāmīn ||
GV01rv_hn06u:424: RV_6,019.09a ā te śuṣmo vṛṣabha etu paścād ottarād adharād ā purastāt |
GV01rv_hn06u:425: RV_6,019.09c ā viśvato abhi sam etv arvāṅ indra dyumnaṃ svarvad dhehy asme ||
GV01rv_hn06u:426: RV_6,019.10a nṛvat ta indra nṛtamābhir ūtī vaṃsīmahi vāmaṃ śromatebhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:427: RV_6,019.10c īkṣe hi vasva ubhayasya rājan dhā ratnam mahi sthūram bṛhantam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:428: RV_6,019.11a marutvantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ vāvṛdhānam akavāriṃ divyaṃ śāsam indram |
GV01rv_hn06u:429: RV_6,019.11c viśvāsāham avase nūtanāyograṃ sahodām iha taṃ huvema ||
GV01rv_hn06u:430: RV_6,019.12a janaṃ vajrin mahi cin manyamānam ebhyo nṛbhyo randhayā yeṣv asmi |
GV01rv_hn06u:431: RV_6,019.12c adhā hi tvā pṛthivyāṃ śūrasātau havāmahe tanaye goṣv apsu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:432: RV_6,019.13a vayaṃ ta ebhiḥ puruhūta sakhyaiḥ śatroḥ-śatror uttara it syāma |
GV01rv_hn06u:433: RV_6,019.13c ghnanto vṛtrāṇy ubhayāni śūra rāyā madema bṛhatā tvotāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:434: RV_6,020.01a dyaur na ya indrābhi bhūmāryas tasthau rayiḥ śavasā pṛtsu janān |
GV01rv_hn06u:435: RV_6,020.01c taṃ naḥ sahasrabharam urvarāsāṃ daddhi sūno sahaso vṛtraturam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:436: RV_6,020.02a divo na tubhyam anv indra satrāsuryaṃ devebhir dhāyi viśvam |
GV01rv_hn06u:437: RV_6,020.02c ahiṃ yad vṛtram apo vavrivāṃsaṃ hann ṛjīṣin viṣṇunā sacānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:438: RV_6,020.03a tūrvann ojīyān tavasas tavīyān kṛtabrahmendro vṛddhamahāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:439: RV_6,020.03c rājābhavan madhunaḥ somyasya viśvāsāṃ yat purāṃ dartnum āvat ||
GV01rv_hn06u:440: RV_6,020.04a śatair apadran paṇaya indrātra daśoṇaye kavaye 'rkasātau |
GV01rv_hn06u:441: RV_6,020.04c vadhaiḥ śuṣṇasyāśuṣasya māyāḥ pitvo nārirecīt kiṃ cana pra ||
GV01rv_hn06u:442: RV_6,020.05a maho druho apa viśvāyu dhāyi vajrasya yat patane pādi śuṣṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:443: RV_6,020.05c uru ṣa sarathaṃ sārathaye kar indraḥ kutsāya sūryasya sātau ||
GV01rv_hn06u:444: RV_6,020.06a pra śyeno na madiram aṃśum asmai śiro dāsasya namucer mathāyan |
GV01rv_hn06u:445: RV_6,020.06c prāvan namīṃ sāpyaṃ sasantam pṛṇag rāyā sam iṣā saṃ svasti ||
GV01rv_hn06u:446: RV_6,020.07a vi pipror ahimāyasya dṛḷhāḥ puro vajriñ chavasā na dardaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:447: RV_6,020.07c sudāman tad rekṇo apramṛṣyam ṛjiśvane dātraṃ dāśuṣe dāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:448: RV_6,020.08a sa vetasuṃ daśamāyaṃ daśoṇiṃ tūtujim indraḥ svabhiṣṭisumnaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:449: RV_6,020.08c ā tugraṃ śaśvad ibhaṃ dyotanāya mātur na sīm upa sṛjā iyadhyai ||
GV01rv_hn06u:450: RV_6,020.09a sa īṃ spṛdho vanate apratīto bibhrad vajraṃ vṛtrahaṇaṃ gabhastau |
GV01rv_hn06u:451: RV_6,020.09c tiṣṭhad dharī adhy asteva garte vacoyujā vahata indram ṛṣvam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:452: RV_6,020.10a sanema te 'vasā navya indra pra pūrava stavanta enā yajñaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:453: RV_6,020.10c sapta yat puraḥ śarma śāradīr dard dhan dāsīḥ purukutsāya śikṣan ||
GV01rv_hn06u:454: RV_6,020.11a tvaṃ vṛdha indra pūrvyo bhūr varivasyann uśane kāvyāya |
GV01rv_hn06u:455: RV_6,020.11c parā navavāstvam anudeyam mahe pitre dadātha svaṃ napātam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:456: RV_6,020.12a tvaṃ dhunir indra dhunimatīr ṛṇor apaḥ sīrā na sravantīḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:457: RV_6,020.12c pra yat samudram ati śūra parṣi pārayā turvaśaṃ yaduṃ svasti ||
GV01rv_hn06u:458: RV_6,020.13a tava ha tyad indra viśvam ājau sasto dhunīcumurī yā ha siṣvap |
GV01rv_hn06u:459: RV_6,020.13c dīdayad it tubhyaṃ somebhiḥ sunvan dabhītir idhmabhṛtiḥ pakthy arkaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:460: RV_6,021.01a imā u tvā purutamasya kāror havyaṃ vīra havyā havante |
GV01rv_hn06u:461: RV_6,021.01c dhiyo ratheṣṭhām ajaraṃ navīyo rayir vibhūtir īyate vacasyā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:462: RV_6,021.02a tam u stuṣa indraṃ yo vidāno girvāhasaṃ gīrbhir yajñavṛddham |
GV01rv_hn06u:463: RV_6,021.02c yasya divam ati mahnā pṛthivyāḥ purumāyasya ririce mahitvam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:464: RV_6,021.03a sa it tamo 'vayunaṃ tatanvat sūryeṇa vayunavac cakāra |
GV01rv_hn06u:465: RV_6,021.03c kadā te martā amṛtasya dhāmeyakṣanto na minanti svadhāvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:466: RV_6,021.04a yas tā cakāra sa kuha svid indraḥ kam ā janaṃ carati kāsu vikṣu |
GV01rv_hn06u:467: RV_6,021.04c kas te yajño manase śaṃ varāya ko arka indra katamaḥ sa hotā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:468: RV_6,021.05a idā hi te veviṣataḥ purājāḥ pratnāsa āsuḥ purukṛt sakhāyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:469: RV_6,021.05c ye madhyamāsa uta nūtanāsa utāvamasya puruhūta bodhi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:470: RV_6,021.06a tam pṛcchanto 'varāsaḥ parāṇi pratnā ta indra śrutyānu yemuḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:471: RV_6,021.06c arcāmasi vīra brahmavāho yād eva vidma tāt tvā mahāntam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:472: RV_6,021.07a abhi tvā pājo rakṣaso vi tasthe mahi jajñānam abhi tat su tiṣṭha |
GV01rv_hn06u:473: RV_6,021.07c tava pratnena yujyena sakhyā vajreṇa dhṛṣṇo apa tā nudasva ||
GV01rv_hn06u:474: RV_6,021.08a sa tu śrudhīndra nūtanasya brahmaṇyato vīra kārudhāyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:475: RV_6,021.08c tvaṃ hy āpiḥ pradivi pitṝṇāṃ śaśvad babhūtha suhava eṣṭau ||
GV01rv_hn06u:476: RV_6,021.09a protaye varuṇam mitram indram marutaḥ kṛṣvāvase no adya |
GV01rv_hn06u:477: RV_6,021.09c pra pūṣaṇaṃ viṣṇum agnim purandhiṃ savitāram oṣadhīḥ parvatāṃś ca ||
GV01rv_hn06u:478: RV_6,021.10a ima u tvā puruśāka prayajyo jaritāro abhy arcanty arkaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:479: RV_6,021.10c śrudhī havam ā huvato huvāno na tvāvāṃ anyo amṛta tvad asti ||
GV01rv_hn06u:480: RV_6,021.11a nū ma ā vācam upa yāhi vidvān viśvebhiḥ sūno sahaso yajatraiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:481: RV_6,021.11c ye agnijihvā ṛtasāpa āsur ye manuṃ cakrur uparaṃ dasāya ||
GV01rv_hn06u:482: RV_6,021.12a sa no bodhi puraetā sugeṣūta durgeṣu pathikṛd vidānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:483: RV_6,021.12c ye aśramāsa uravo vahiṣṭhās tebhir na indrābhi vakṣi vājam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:484: RV_6,022.01a ya eka id dhavyaś carṣaṇīnām indraṃ taṃ gīrbhir abhy arca ābhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:485: RV_6,022.01c yaḥ patyate vṛṣabho vṛṣṇyāvān satyaḥ satvā purumāyaḥ sahasvān ||
GV01rv_hn06u:486: RV_6,022.02a tam u naḥ pūrve pitaro navagvāḥ sapta viprāso abhi vājayantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:487: RV_6,022.02c nakṣaddābhaṃ taturim parvateṣṭhām adroghavācam matibhiḥ śaviṣṭham ||
GV01rv_hn06u:488: RV_6,022.03a tam īmaha indram asya rāyaḥ puruvīrasya nṛvataḥ purukṣoḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:489: RV_6,022.03c yo askṛdhoyur ajaraḥ svarvān tam ā bhara harivo mādayadhyai ||
GV01rv_hn06u:490: RV_6,022.04a tan no vi voco yadi te purā cij jaritāra ānaśuḥ sumnam indra |
GV01rv_hn06u:491: RV_6,022.04c kas te bhāgaḥ kiṃ vayo dudhra khidvaḥ puruhūta purūvaso 'suraghnaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:492: RV_6,022.05a tam pṛcchantī vajrahastaṃ ratheṣṭhām indraṃ vepī vakvarī yasya nū gīḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:493: RV_6,022.05c tuvigrābhaṃ tuvikūrmiṃ rabhodāṃ gātum iṣe nakṣate tumram accha ||
GV01rv_hn06u:494: RV_6,022.06a ayā ha tyam māyayā vāvṛdhānam manojuvā svatavaḥ parvatena |
GV01rv_hn06u:495: RV_6,022.06c acyutā cid vīḷitā svojo rujo vi dṛḷhā dhṛṣatā virapśin ||
GV01rv_hn06u:496: RV_6,022.07a taṃ vo dhiyā navyasyā śaviṣṭham pratnam pratnavat paritaṃsayadhyai |
GV01rv_hn06u:497: RV_6,022.07c sa no vakṣad animānaḥ suvahmendro viśvāny ati durgahāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:498: RV_6,022.08a ā janāya druhvaṇe pārthivāni divyāni dīpayo 'ntarikṣā |
GV01rv_hn06u:499: RV_6,022.08c tapā vṛṣan viśvataḥ śociṣā tān brahmadviṣe śocaya kṣām apaś ca ||
GV01rv_hn06u:500: RV_6,022.09a bhuvo janasya divyasya rājā pārthivasya jagatas tveṣasaṃdṛk |
GV01rv_hn06u:501: RV_6,022.09c dhiṣva vajraṃ dakṣiṇa indra haste viśvā ajurya dayase vi māyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:502: RV_6,022.10a ā saṃyatam indra ṇaḥ svastiṃ śatrutūryāya bṛhatīm amṛdhrām |
GV01rv_hn06u:503: RV_6,022.10c yayā dāsāny āryāṇi vṛtrā karo vajrin sutukā nāhuṣāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:504: RV_6,022.11a sa no niyudbhiḥ puruhūta vedho viśvavārābhir ā gahi prayajyo |
GV01rv_hn06u:505: RV_6,022.11c na yā adevo varate na deva ābhir yāhi tūyam ā madryadrik ||
GV01rv_hn06u:506: RV_6,023.01a suta it tvaṃ nimiśla indra some stome brahmaṇi śasyamāna ukthe |
GV01rv_hn06u:507: RV_6,023.01c yad vā yuktābhyām maghavan haribhyām bibhrad vajram bāhvor indra yāsi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:508: RV_6,023.02a yad vā divi pārye suṣvim indra vṛtrahatye 'vasi śūrasātau |
GV01rv_hn06u:509: RV_6,023.02c yad vā dakṣasya bibhyuṣo abibhyad arandhayaḥ śardhata indra dasyūn ||
GV01rv_hn06u:510: RV_6,023.03a pātā sutam indro astu somam praṇenīr ugro jaritāram ūtī |
GV01rv_hn06u:511: RV_6,023.03c kartā vīrāya suṣvaya u lokaṃ dātā vasu stuvate kīraye cit ||
GV01rv_hn06u:512: RV_6,023.04a ganteyānti savanā haribhyām babhrir vajram papiḥ somaṃ dadir gāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:513: RV_6,023.04c kartā vīraṃ naryaṃ sarvavīraṃ śrotā havaṃ gṛṇata stomavāhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:514: RV_6,023.05a asmai vayaṃ yad vāvāna tad viviṣma indrāya yo naḥ pradivo apas kaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:515: RV_6,023.05c sute some stumasi śaṃsad ukthendrāya brahma vardhanaṃ yathāsat ||
GV01rv_hn06u:516: RV_6,023.06a brahmāṇi hi cakṛṣe vardhanāni tāvat ta indra matibhir viviṣmaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:517: RV_6,023.06c sute some sutapāḥ śantamāni rāṇḍyā kriyāsma vakṣaṇāni yajñaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:518: RV_6,023.07a sa no bodhi puroḷāśaṃ rarāṇaḥ pibā tu somaṃ goṛjīkam indra |
GV01rv_hn06u:519: RV_6,023.07c edam barhir yajamānasya sīdoruṃ kṛdhi tvāyata u lokam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:520: RV_6,023.08a sa mandasvā hy anu joṣam ugra pra tvā yajñāsa ime aśnuvantu |
GV01rv_hn06u:521: RV_6,023.08c preme havāsaḥ puruhūtam asme ā tveyaṃ dhīr avasa indra yamyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:522: RV_6,023.09a taṃ vaḥ sakhāyaḥ saṃ yathā suteṣu somebhir īm pṛṇatā bhojam indram |
GV01rv_hn06u:523: RV_6,023.09c kuvit tasmā asati no bharāya na suṣvim indro 'vase mṛdhāti ||
GV01rv_hn06u:524: RV_6,023.10a eved indraḥ sute astāvi some bharadvājeṣu kṣayad in maghonaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:525: RV_6,023.10c asad yathā jaritra uta sūrir indro rāyo viśvavārasya dātā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:526: RV_6,024.01a vṛṣā mada indre śloka ukthā sacā someṣu sutapā ṛjīṣī |
GV01rv_hn06u:527: RV_6,024.01c arcatryo maghavā nṛbhya ukthair dyukṣo rājā girām akṣitotiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:528: RV_6,024.02a taturir vīro naryo vicetāḥ śrotā havaṃ gṛṇata urvyūtiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:529: RV_6,024.02c vasuḥ śaṃso narāṃ kārudhāyā vājī stuto vidathe dāti vājam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:530: RV_6,024.03a akṣo na cakryoḥ śūra bṛhan pra te mahnā ririce rodasyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:531: RV_6,024.03c vṛkṣasya nu te puruhūta vayā vy ūtayo ruruhur indra pūrvīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:532: RV_6,024.04a śacīvatas te puruśāka śākā gavām iva srutayaḥ saṃcaraṇīḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:533: RV_6,024.04c vatsānāṃ na tantayas ta indra dāmanvanto adāmānaḥ sudāman ||
GV01rv_hn06u:534: RV_6,024.05a anyad adya karvaram anyad u śvo 'sac ca san muhur ācakrir indraḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:535: RV_6,024.05c mitro no atra varuṇaś ca pūṣāryo vaśasya paryetāsti ||
GV01rv_hn06u:536: RV_6,024.06a vi tvad āpo na parvatasya pṛṣṭhād ukthebhir indrānayanta yajñaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:537: RV_6,024.06c taṃ tvābhiḥ suṣṭutibhir vājayanta ājiṃ na jagmur girvāho aśvāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:538: RV_6,024.07a na yaṃ jaranti śarado na māsā na dyāva indram avakarśayanti |
GV01rv_hn06u:539: RV_6,024.07c vṛddhasya cid vardhatām asya tanū stomebhir ukthaiś ca śasyamānā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:540: RV_6,024.08a na vīḷave namate na sthirāya na śardhate dasyujūtāya stavān |
GV01rv_hn06u:541: RV_6,024.08c ajrā indrasya girayaś cid ṛṣvā gambhīre cid bhavati gādham asmai ||
GV01rv_hn06u:542: RV_6,024.09a gambhīreṇa na uruṇāmatrin preṣo yandhi sutapāvan vājān |
GV01rv_hn06u:543: RV_6,024.09c sthā ū ṣu ūrdhva ūtī ariṣaṇyann aktor vyuṣṭau paritakmyāyām ||
GV01rv_hn06u:544: RV_6,024.10a sacasva nāyam avase abhīka ito vā tam indra pāhi riṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:545: RV_6,024.10c amā cainam araṇye pāhi riṣo madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:546: RV_6,025.01a yā ta ūtir avamā yā paramā yā madhyamendra śuṣminn asti |
GV01rv_hn06u:547: RV_6,025.01c tābhir ū ṣu vṛtrahatye 'vīr na ebhiś ca vājair mahān na ugra ||
GV01rv_hn06u:548: RV_6,025.02a ābhi spṛdho mithatīr ariṣaṇyann amitrasya vyathayā manyum indra |
GV01rv_hn06u:549: RV_6,025.02c ābhir viśvā abhiyujo viṣūcīr āryāya viśo 'va tārīr dāsīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:550: RV_6,025.03a indra jāmaya uta ye 'jāmayo 'rvācīnāso vanuṣo yuyujre |
GV01rv_hn06u:551: RV_6,025.03c tvam eṣāṃ vithurā śavāṃsi jahi vṛṣṇyāni kṛṇuhī parācaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:552: RV_6,025.04a śūro vā śūraṃ vanate śarīrais tanūrucā taruṣi yat kṛṇvaite |
GV01rv_hn06u:553: RV_6,025.04c toke vā goṣu tanaye yad apsu vi krandasī urvarāsu bravaite ||
GV01rv_hn06u:554: RV_6,025.05a nahi tvā śūro na turo na dhṛṣṇur na tvā yodho manyamāno yuyodha |
GV01rv_hn06u:555: RV_6,025.05c indra nakiṣ ṭvā praty asty eṣāṃ viśvā jātāny abhy asi tāni ||
GV01rv_hn06u:556: RV_6,025.06a sa patyata ubhayor nṛmṇam ayor yadī vedhasaḥ samithe havante |
GV01rv_hn06u:557: RV_6,025.06c vṛtre vā maho nṛvati kṣaye vā vyacasvantā yadi vitantasaite ||
GV01rv_hn06u:558: RV_6,025.07a adha smā te carṣaṇayo yad ejān indra trātota bhavā varūtā |
GV01rv_hn06u:559: RV_6,025.07c asmākāso ye nṛtamāso arya indra sūrayo dadhire puro naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:560: RV_6,025.08a anu te dāyi maha indriyāya satrā te viśvam anu vṛtrahatye |
GV01rv_hn06u:561: RV_6,025.08c anu kṣatram anu saho yajatrendra devebhir anu te nṛṣahye ||
GV01rv_hn06u:562: RV_6,025.09a evā na spṛdhaḥ sam ajā samatsv indra rārandhi mithatīr adevīḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:563: RV_6,025.09c vidyāma vastor avasā gṛṇanto bharadvājā uta ta indra nūnam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:564: RV_6,026.01a śrudhī na indra hvayāmasi tvā maho vājasya sātau vāvṛṣāṇāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:565: RV_6,026.01c saṃ yad viśo 'yanta śūrasātā ugraṃ no 'vaḥ pārye ahan dāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:566: RV_6,026.02a tvāṃ vājī havate vājineyo maho vājasya gadhyasya sātau |
GV01rv_hn06u:567: RV_6,026.02c tvāṃ vṛtreṣv indra satpatiṃ tarutraṃ tvāṃ caṣṭe muṣṭihā goṣu yudhyan ||
GV01rv_hn06u:568: RV_6,026.03a tvaṃ kaviṃ codayo 'rkasātau tvaṃ kutsāya śuṣṇaṃ dāśuṣe vark |
GV01rv_hn06u:569: RV_6,026.03c tvaṃ śiro amarmaṇaḥ parāhann atithigvāya śaṃsyaṃ kariṣyan ||
GV01rv_hn06u:570: RV_6,026.04a tvaṃ ratham pra bharo yodham ṛṣvam āvo yudhyantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ daśadyum |
GV01rv_hn06u:571: RV_6,026.04c tvaṃ tugraṃ vetasave sacāhan tvaṃ tujiṃ gṛṇantam indra tūtoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:572: RV_6,026.05a tvaṃ tad uktham indra barhaṇā kaḥ pra yac chatā sahasrā śūra darṣi |
GV01rv_hn06u:573: RV_6,026.05c ava girer dāsaṃ śambaraṃ han prāvo divodāsaṃ citrābhir ūtī ||
GV01rv_hn06u:574: RV_6,026.06a tvaṃ śraddhābhir mandasānaḥ somair dabhītaye cumurim indra siṣvap |
GV01rv_hn06u:575: RV_6,026.06c tvaṃ rajim piṭhīnase daśasyan ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrā śacyā sacāhan ||
GV01rv_hn06u:576: RV_6,026.07a ahaṃ cana tat sūribhir ānaśyāṃ tava jyāya indra sumnam ojaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:577: RV_6,026.07c tvayā yat stavante sadhavīra vīrās trivarūthena nahuṣā śaviṣṭha ||
GV01rv_hn06u:578: RV_6,026.08a vayaṃ te asyām indra dyumnahūtau sakhāyaḥ syāma mahina preṣṭhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:579: RV_6,026.08c prātardaniḥ kṣatraśrīr astu śreṣṭho ghane vṛtrāṇāṃ sanaye dhanānām ||
GV01rv_hn06u:580: RV_6,027.01a kim asya made kim v asya pītāv indraḥ kim asya sakhye cakāra |
GV01rv_hn06u:581: RV_6,027.01c raṇā vā ye niṣadi kiṃ te asya purā vividre kim u nūtanāsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:582: RV_6,027.02a sad asya made sad v asya pītāv indraḥ sad asya sakhye cakāra |
GV01rv_hn06u:583: RV_6,027.02c raṇā vā ye niṣadi sat te asya purā vividre sad u nūtanāsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:584: RV_6,027.03a nahi nu te mahimanaḥ samasya na maghavan maghavattvasya vidma |
GV01rv_hn06u:585: RV_6,027.03c na rādhaso-rādhaso nūtanasyendra nakir dadṛśa indriyaṃ te ||
GV01rv_hn06u:586: RV_6,027.04a etat tyat ta indriyam aceti yenāvadhīr varaśikhasya śeṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:587: RV_6,027.04c vajrasya yat te nihatasya śuṣmāt svanāc cid indra paramo dadāra ||
GV01rv_hn06u:588: RV_6,027.05a vadhīd indro varaśikhasya śeṣo 'bhyāvartine cāyamānāya śikṣan |
GV01rv_hn06u:589: RV_6,027.05c vṛcīvato yad dhariyūpīyāyāṃ han pūrve ardhe bhiyasāparo dart ||
GV01rv_hn06u:590: RV_6,027.06a triṃśacchataṃ varmiṇa indra sākaṃ yavyāvatyām puruhūta śravasyā |
GV01rv_hn06u:591: RV_6,027.06c vṛcīvantaḥ śarave patyamānāḥ pātrā bhindānā nyarthāny āyan ||
GV01rv_hn06u:592: RV_6,027.07a yasya gāvāv aruṣā sūyavasyū antar ū ṣu carato rerihāṇā |
GV01rv_hn06u:593: RV_6,027.07c sa sṛñjayāya turvaśam parādād vṛcīvato daivavātāya śikṣan ||
GV01rv_hn06u:594: RV_6,027.08a dvayāṃ agne rathino viṃśatiṃ gā vadhūmato maghavā mahyaṃ samrāṭ |
GV01rv_hn06u:595: RV_6,027.08c abhyāvartī cāyamāno dadāti dūṇāśeyaṃ dakṣiṇā pārthavānām ||
GV01rv_hn06u:596: RV_6,028.01a ā gāvo agmann uta bhadram akran sīdantu goṣṭhe raṇayantv asme |
GV01rv_hn06u:597: RV_6,028.01c prajāvatīḥ pururūpā iha syur indrāya pūrvīr uṣaso duhānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:598: RV_6,028.02a indro yajvane pṛṇate ca śikṣaty uped dadāti na svam muṣāyati |
GV01rv_hn06u:599: RV_6,028.02c bhūyo-bhūyo rayim id asya vardhayann abhinne khilye ni dadhāti devayum ||
GV01rv_hn06u:600: RV_6,028.03a na tā naśanti na dabhāti taskaro nāsām āmitro vyathir ā dadharṣati |
GV01rv_hn06u:601: RV_6,028.03c devāṃś ca yābhir yajate dadāti ca jyog it tābhiḥ sacate gopatiḥ saha ||
GV01rv_hn06u:602: RV_6,028.04a na tā arvā reṇukakāṭo aśnute na saṃskṛtatram upa yanti tā abhi |
GV01rv_hn06u:603: RV_6,028.04c urugāyam abhayaṃ tasya tā anu gāvo martasya vi caranti yajvanaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:604: RV_6,028.05a gāvo bhago gāva indro me acchān gāvaḥ somasya prathamasya bhakṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:605: RV_6,028.05c imā yā gāvaḥ sa janāsa indra icchāmīd dhṛdā manasā cid indram ||
GV01rv_hn06u:606: RV_6,028.06a yūyaṃ gāvo medayathā kṛśaṃ cid aśrīraṃ cit kṛṇuthā supratīkam |
GV01rv_hn06u:607: RV_6,028.06c bhadraṃ gṛhaṃ kṛṇutha bhadravāco bṛhad vo vaya ucyate sabhāsu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:608: RV_6,028.07a prajāvatīḥ sūyavasaṃ riśantīḥ śuddhā apaḥ suprapāṇe pibantīḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:609: RV_6,028.07c mā va stena īśata māghaśaṃsaḥ pari vo hetī rudrasya vṛjyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:610: RV_6,028.08a upedam upaparcanam āsu goṣūpa pṛcyatām |
GV01rv_hn06u:611: RV_6,028.08c upa ṛṣabhasya retasy upendra tava vīrye ||
GV01rv_hn06u:612: RV_6,029.01a indraṃ vo naraḥ sakhyāya sepur maho yantaḥ sumataye cakānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:613: RV_6,029.01c maho hi dātā vajrahasto asti mahām u raṇvam avase yajadhvam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:614: RV_6,029.02a ā yasmin haste naryā mimikṣur ā rathe hiraṇyaye ratheṣṭhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:615: RV_6,029.02c ā raśmayo gabhastyo sthūrayor ādhvann aśvāso vṛṣaṇo yujānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:616: RV_6,029.03a śriye te pādā duva ā mimikṣur dhṛṣṇur vajrī śavasā dakṣiṇāvān |
GV01rv_hn06u:617: RV_6,029.03c vasāno atkaṃ surabhiṃ dṛśe kaṃ svar ṇa nṛtav iṣiro babhūtha ||
GV01rv_hn06u:618: RV_6,029.04a sa soma āmiślatamaḥ suto bhūd yasmin paktiḥ pacyate santi dhānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:619: RV_6,029.04c indraṃ nara stuvanto brahmakārā ukthā śaṃsanto devavātatamāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:620: RV_6,029.05a na te antaḥ śavaso dhāyy asya vi tu bābadhe rodasī mahitvā |
GV01rv_hn06u:621: RV_6,029.05c ā tā sūriḥ pṛṇati tūtujāno yūthevāpsu samījamāna ūtī ||
GV01rv_hn06u:622: RV_6,029.06a eved indraḥ suhava ṛṣvo astūtī anūtī hiriśipraḥ satvā |
GV01rv_hn06u:623: RV_6,029.06c evā hi jāto asamātyojāḥ purū ca vṛtrā hanati ni dasyūn ||
GV01rv_hn06u:624: RV_6,030.01a bhūya id vāvṛdhe vīryāyaṃ eko ajuryo dayate vasūni |
GV01rv_hn06u:625: RV_6,030.01c pra ririce diva indraḥ pṛthivyā ardham id asya prati rodasī ubhe ||
GV01rv_hn06u:626: RV_6,030.02a adhā manye bṛhad asuryam asya yāni dādhāra nakir ā mināti |
GV01rv_hn06u:627: RV_6,030.02c dive-dive sūryo darśato bhūd vi sadmāny urviyā sukratur dhāt ||
GV01rv_hn06u:628: RV_6,030.03a adyā cin nū cit tad apo nadīnāṃ yad ābhyo arado gātum indra |
GV01rv_hn06u:629: RV_6,030.03c ni parvatā admasado na sedus tvayā dṛḷhāni sukrato rajāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:630: RV_6,030.04a satyam it tan na tvāvāṃ anyo astīndra devo na martyo jyāyān |
GV01rv_hn06u:631: RV_6,030.04c ahann ahim pariśayānam arṇo 'vāsṛjo apo acchā samudram ||
GV01rv_hn06u:632: RV_6,030.05a tvam apo vi duro viṣūcīr indra dṛḷham arujaḥ parvatasya |
GV01rv_hn06u:633: RV_6,030.05c rājābhavo jagataś carṣaṇīnāṃ sākaṃ sūryaṃ janayan dyām uṣāsam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:634: RV_6,031.01a abhūr eko rayipate rayīṇām ā hastayor adhithā indra kṛṣṭīḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:635: RV_6,031.01c vi toke apsu tanaye ca sūre 'vocanta carṣaṇayo vivācaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:636: RV_6,031.02a tvad bhiyendra pārthivāni viśvācyutā cic cyāvayante rajāṃsi |
GV01rv_hn06u:637: RV_6,031.02c dyāvākṣāmā parvatāso vanāni viśvaṃ dṛḷham bhayate ajmann ā te ||
GV01rv_hn06u:638: RV_6,031.03a tvaṃ kutsenābhi śuṣṇam indrāśuṣaṃ yudhya kuyavaṃ gaviṣṭau |
GV01rv_hn06u:639: RV_6,031.03c daśa prapitve adha sūryasya muṣāyaś cakram avive rapāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:640: RV_6,031.04a tvaṃ śatāny ava śambarasya puro jaghanthāpratīni dasyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:641: RV_6,031.04c aśikṣo yatra śacyā śacīvo divodāsāya sunvate sutakre bharadvājāya gṛṇate vasūni ||
GV01rv_hn06u:642: RV_6,031.05a sa satyasatvan mahate raṇāya ratham ā tiṣṭha tuvinṛmṇa bhīmam |
GV01rv_hn06u:643: RV_6,031.05c yāhi prapathinn avasopa madrik pra ca śruta śrāvaya carṣaṇibhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:644: RV_6,032.01a apūrvyā purutamāny asmai mahe vīrāya tavase turāya |
GV01rv_hn06u:645: RV_6,032.01c virapśine vajriṇe śantamāni vacāṃsy āsā sthavirāya takṣam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:646: RV_6,032.02a sa mātarā sūryeṇā kavīnām avāsayad rujad adriṃ gṛṇānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:647: RV_6,032.02c svādhībhir ṛkvabhir vāvaśāna ud usriyāṇām asṛjan nidānam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:648: RV_6,032.03a sa vahnibhir ṛkvabhir goṣu śaśvan mitajñubhiḥ purukṛtvā jigāya |
GV01rv_hn06u:649: RV_6,032.03c puraḥ purohā sakhibhiḥ sakhīyan dṛḷhā ruroja kavibhiḥ kaviḥ san ||
GV01rv_hn06u:650: RV_6,032.04a sa nīvyābhir jaritāram acchā maho vājebhir mahadbhiś ca śuṣmaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:651: RV_6,032.04c puruvīrābhir vṛṣabha kṣitīnām ā girvaṇaḥ suvitāya pra yāhi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:652: RV_6,032.05a sa sargeṇa śavasā takto atyair apa indro dakṣiṇatas turāṣāṭ |
GV01rv_hn06u:653: RV_6,032.05c itthā sṛjānā anapāvṛd arthaṃ dive-dive viviṣur apramṛṣyam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:654: RV_6,033.01a ya ojiṣṭha indra taṃ su no dā mado vṛṣan svabhiṣṭir dāsvān |
GV01rv_hn06u:655: RV_6,033.01c sauvaśvyaṃ yo vanavat svaśvo vṛtrā samatsu sāsahad amitrān ||
GV01rv_hn06u:656: RV_6,033.02a tvāṃ hīndrāvase vivāco havante carṣaṇayaḥ śūrasātau |
GV01rv_hn06u:657: RV_6,033.02c tvaṃ viprebhir vi paṇīṃr aśāyas tvota it sanitā vājam arvā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:658: RV_6,033.03a tvaṃ tāṃ indrobhayāṃ amitrān dāsā vṛtrāṇy āryā ca śūra |
GV01rv_hn06u:659: RV_6,033.03c vadhīr vaneva sudhitebhir atkair ā pṛtsu darṣi nṛṇāṃ nṛtama ||
GV01rv_hn06u:660: RV_6,033.04a sa tvaṃ na indrākavābhir ūtī sakhā viśvāyur avitā vṛdhe bhūḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:661: RV_6,033.04c svarṣātā yad dhvayāmasi tvā yudhyanto nemadhitā pṛtsu śūra ||
GV01rv_hn06u:662: RV_6,033.05a nūnaṃ na indrāparāya ca syā bhavā mṛḷīka uta no abhiṣṭau |
GV01rv_hn06u:663: RV_6,033.05c itthā gṛṇanto mahinasya śarman divi ṣyāma pārye goṣatamāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:664: RV_6,034.01a saṃ ca tve jagmur gira indra pūrvīr vi ca tvad yanti vibhvo manīṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:665: RV_6,034.01c purā nūnaṃ ca stutaya ṛṣīṇām paspṛdhra indre adhy ukthārkā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:666: RV_6,034.02a puruhūto yaḥ purugūrta ṛbhvāṃ ekaḥ purupraśasto asti yajñaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:667: RV_6,034.02c ratho na mahe śavase yujāno 'smābhir indro anumādyo bhūt ||
GV01rv_hn06u:668: RV_6,034.03a na yaṃ hiṃsanti dhītayo na vāṇīr indraṃ nakṣantīd abhi vardhayantīḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:669: RV_6,034.03c yadi stotāraḥ śataṃ yat sahasraṃ gṛṇanti girvaṇasaṃ śaṃ tad asmai ||
GV01rv_hn06u:670: RV_6,034.04a asmā etad divy arceva māsā mimikṣa indre ny ayāmi somaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:671: RV_6,034.04c janaṃ na dhanvann abhi saṃ yad āpaḥ satrā vāvṛdhur havanāni yajñaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:672: RV_6,034.05a asmā etan mahy āṅgūṣam asmā indrāya stotram matibhir avāci |
GV01rv_hn06u:673: RV_6,034.05c asad yathā mahati vṛtratūrya indro viśvāyur avitā vṛdhaś ca ||
GV01rv_hn06u:674: RV_6,035.01a kadā bhuvan rathakṣayāṇi brahma kadā stotre sahasrapoṣyaṃ dāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:675: RV_6,035.01c kadā stomaṃ vāsayo 'sya rāyā kadā dhiyaḥ karasi vājaratnāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:676: RV_6,035.02a karhi svit tad indra yan nṛbhir nṝn vīrair vīrān nīḷayāse jayājīn |
GV01rv_hn06u:677: RV_6,035.02c tridhātu gā adhi jayāsi goṣv indra dyumnaṃ svarvad dhehy asme ||
GV01rv_hn06u:678: RV_6,035.03a karhi svit tad indra yaj jaritre viśvapsu brahma kṛṇavaḥ śaviṣṭha |
GV01rv_hn06u:679: RV_6,035.03c kadā dhiyo na niyuto yuvāse kadā gomaghā havanāni gacchāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:680: RV_6,035.04a sa gomaghā jaritre aśvaścandrā vājaśravaso adhi dhehi pṛkṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:681: RV_6,035.04c pīpihīṣaḥ sudughām indra dhenum bharadvājeṣu suruco rurucyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:682: RV_6,035.05a tam ā nūnaṃ vṛjanam anyathā cic chūro yac chakra vi duro gṛṇīṣe |
GV01rv_hn06u:683: RV_6,035.05c mā nir araṃ śukradughasya dhenor āṅgirasān brahmaṇā vipra jinva ||
GV01rv_hn06u:684: RV_6,036.01a satrā madāsas tava viśvajanyāḥ satrā rāyo 'dha ye pārthivāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:685: RV_6,036.01c satrā vājānām abhavo vibhaktā yad deveṣu dhārayathā asuryam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:686: RV_6,036.02a anu pra yeje jana ojo asya satrā dadhire anu vīryāya |
GV01rv_hn06u:687: RV_6,036.02c syūmagṛbhe dudhaye 'rvate ca kratuṃ vṛñjanty api vṛtrahatye ||
GV01rv_hn06u:688: RV_6,036.03a taṃ sadhrīcīr ūtayo vṛṣṇyāni pauṃsyāni niyutaḥ saścur indram |
GV01rv_hn06u:689: RV_6,036.03c samudraṃ na sindhava ukthaśuṣmā uruvyacasaṃ gira ā viśanti ||
GV01rv_hn06u:690: RV_6,036.04a sa rāyas khām upa sṛjā gṛṇānaḥ puruścandrasya tvam indra vasvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:691: RV_6,036.04c patir babhūthāsamo janānām eko viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:692: RV_6,036.05a sa tu śrudhi śrutyā yo duvoyur dyaur na bhūmābhi rāyo aryaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:693: RV_6,036.05c aso yathā naḥ śavasā cakāno yuge-yuge vayasā cekitānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:694: RV_6,037.01a arvāg rathaṃ viśvavāraṃ ta ugrendra yuktāso harayo vahantu |
GV01rv_hn06u:695: RV_6,037.01c kīriś cid dhi tvā havate svarvān ṛdhīmahi sadhamādas te adya ||
GV01rv_hn06u:696: RV_6,037.02a pro droṇe harayaḥ karmāgman punānāsa ṛjyanto abhūvan |
GV01rv_hn06u:697: RV_6,037.02c indro no asya pūrvyaḥ papīyād dyukṣo madasya somyasya rājā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:698: RV_6,037.03a āsasrāṇāsaḥ śavasānam acchendraṃ sucakre rathyāso aśvāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:699: RV_6,037.03c abhi śrava ṛjyanto vaheyur nū cin nu vāyor amṛtaṃ vi dasyet ||
GV01rv_hn06u:700: RV_6,037.04a variṣṭho asya dakṣiṇām iyartīndro maghonāṃ tuvikūrmitamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:701: RV_6,037.04c yayā vajrivaḥ pariyāsy aṃho maghā ca dhṛṣṇo dayase vi sūrīn ||
GV01rv_hn06u:702: RV_6,037.05a indro vājasya sthavirasya dātendro gīrbhir vardhatāṃ vṛddhamahāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:703: RV_6,037.05c indro vṛtraṃ haniṣṭho astu satvā tā sūriḥ pṛṇati tūtujānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:704: RV_6,038.01a apād ita ud u naś citratamo mahīm bharṣad dyumatīm indrahūtim |
GV01rv_hn06u:705: RV_6,038.01c panyasīṃ dhītiṃ daivyasya yāmañ janasya rātiṃ vanate sudānuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:706: RV_6,038.02a dūrāc cid ā vasato asya karṇā ghoṣād indrasya tanyati bruvāṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:707: RV_6,038.02c eyam enaṃ devahūtir vavṛtyān madryag indram iyam ṛcyamānā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:708: RV_6,038.03a taṃ vo dhiyā paramayā purājām ajaram indram abhy anūṣy arkaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:709: RV_6,038.03c brahmā ca giro dadhire sam asmin mahāṃś ca stomo adhi vardhad indre ||
GV01rv_hn06u:710: RV_6,038.04a vardhād yaṃ yajña uta soma indraṃ vardhād brahma gira ukthā ca manma |
GV01rv_hn06u:711: RV_6,038.04c vardhāhainam uṣaso yāmann aktor vardhān māsāḥ śarado dyāva indram ||
GV01rv_hn06u:712: RV_6,038.05a evā jajñānaṃ sahase asāmi vāvṛdhānaṃ rādhase ca śrutāya |
GV01rv_hn06u:713: RV_6,038.05c mahām ugram avase vipra nūnam ā vivāsema vṛtratūryeṣu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:714: RV_6,039.01a mandrasya kaver divyasya vahner vipramanmano vacanasya madhvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:715: RV_6,039.01c apā nas tasya sacanasya deveṣo yuvasva gṛṇate goagrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:716: RV_6,039.02a ayam uśānaḥ pary adrim usrā ṛtadhītibhir ṛtayug yujānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:717: RV_6,039.02c rujad arugṇaṃ vi valasya sānum paṇīṃr vacobhir abhi yodhad indraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:718: RV_6,039.03a ayaṃ dyotayad adyuto vy aktūn doṣā vastoḥ śarada indur indra |
GV01rv_hn06u:719: RV_6,039.03c imaṃ ketum adadhur nū cid ahnāṃ śucijanmana uṣasaś cakāra ||
GV01rv_hn06u:720: RV_6,039.04a ayaṃ rocayad aruco rucāno 'yaṃ vāsayad vy ṛtena pūrvīḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:721: RV_6,039.04c ayam īyata ṛtayugbhir aśvaiḥ svarvidā nābhinā carṣaṇiprāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:722: RV_6,039.05a nū gṛṇāno gṛṇate pratna rājann iṣaḥ pinva vasudeyāya pūrvīḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:723: RV_6,039.05c apa oṣadhīr aviṣā vanāni gā arvato nṝn ṛcase rirīhi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:724: RV_6,040.01a indra piba tubhyaṃ suto madāyāva sya harī vi mucā sakhāyā |
GV01rv_hn06u:725: RV_6,040.01c uta pra gāya gaṇa ā niṣadyāthā yajñāya gṛṇate vayo dhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:726: RV_6,040.02a asya piba yasya jajñāna indra madāya kratve apibo virapśin |
GV01rv_hn06u:727: RV_6,040.02c tam u te gāvo nara āpo adrir induṃ sam ahyan pītaye sam asmai ||
GV01rv_hn06u:728: RV_6,040.03a samiddhe agnau suta indra soma ā tvā vahantu harayo vahiṣṭhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:729: RV_6,040.03c tvāyatā manasā johavīmīndrā yāhi suvitāya mahe naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:730: RV_6,040.04a ā yāhi śaśvad uśatā yayāthendra mahā manasā somapeyam |
GV01rv_hn06u:731: RV_6,040.04c upa brahmāṇi śṛṇava imā no 'thā te yajñas tanve vayo dhāt ||
GV01rv_hn06u:732: RV_6,040.05a yad indra divi pārye yad ṛdhag yad vā sve sadane yatra vāsi |
GV01rv_hn06u:733: RV_6,040.05c ato no yajñam avase niyutvān sajoṣāḥ pāhi girvaṇo marudbhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:734: RV_6,041.01a aheḷamāna upa yāhi yajñaṃ tubhyam pavanta indavaḥ sutāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:735: RV_6,041.01c gāvo na vajrin svam oko acchendrā gahi prathamo yajñiyānām ||
GV01rv_hn06u:736: RV_6,041.02a yā te kākut sukṛtā yā variṣṭhā yayā śaśvat pibasi madhva ūrmim |
GV01rv_hn06u:737: RV_6,041.02c tayā pāhi pra te adhvaryur asthāt saṃ te vajro vartatām indra gavyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:738: RV_6,041.03a eṣa drapso vṛṣabho viśvarūpa indrāya vṛṣṇe sam akāri somaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:739: RV_6,041.03c etam piba hariva sthātar ugra yasyeśiṣe pradivi yas te annam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:740: RV_6,041.04a sutaḥ somo asutād indra vasyān ayaṃ śreyāñ cikituṣe raṇāya |
GV01rv_hn06u:741: RV_6,041.04c etaṃ titirva upa yāhi yajñaṃ tena viśvās taviṣīr ā pṛṇasva ||
GV01rv_hn06u:742: RV_6,041.05a hvayāmasi tvendra yāhy arvāṅ araṃ te somas tanve bhavāti |
GV01rv_hn06u:743: RV_6,041.05c śatakrato mādayasvā suteṣu prāsmāṃ ava pṛtanāsu pra vikṣu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:744: RV_6,042.01a praty asmai pipīṣate viśvāni viduṣe bhara |
GV01rv_hn06u:746: RV_6,042.02a em enam pratyetana somebhiḥ somapātamam |
GV01rv_hn06u:747: RV_6,042.02c amatrebhir ṛjīṣiṇam indraṃ sutebhir indubhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:748: RV_6,042.03a yadī sutebhir indubhiḥ somebhiḥ pratibhūṣatha |
GV01rv_hn06u:749: RV_6,042.03c vedā viśvasya medhiro dhṛṣat taṃ-tam id eṣate ||
GV01rv_hn06u:750: RV_6,042.04a asmā-asmā id andhaso 'dhvaryo pra bharā sutam |
GV01rv_hn06u:751: RV_6,042.04c kuvit samasya jenyasya śardhato 'bhiśaster avasparat ||
GV01rv_hn06u:752: RV_6,043.01a yasya tyac chambaram made divodāsāya randhayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:753: RV_6,043.01c ayaṃ sa soma indra te sutaḥ piba ||
GV01rv_hn06u:754: RV_6,043.02a yasya tīvrasutam madam madhyam antaṃ ca rakṣase |
GV01rv_hn06u:755: RV_6,043.02c ayaṃ sa soma indra te sutaḥ piba ||
GV01rv_hn06u:756: RV_6,043.03a yasya gā antar aśmano made dṛḷhā avāsṛjaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:757: RV_6,043.03c ayaṃ sa soma indra te sutaḥ piba ||
GV01rv_hn06u:758: RV_6,043.04a yasya mandāno andhaso māghonaṃ dadhiṣe śavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:759: RV_6,043.04c ayaṃ sa soma indra te sutaḥ piba ||
GV01rv_hn06u:760: RV_6,044.01a yo rayivo rayintamo yo dyumnair dyumnavattamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:761: RV_6,044.01c somaḥ sutaḥ sa indra te 'sti svadhāpate madaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:762: RV_6,044.02a yaḥ śagmas tuviśagma te rāyo dāmā matīnām |
GV01rv_hn06u:763: RV_6,044.02c somaḥ sutaḥ sa indra te 'sti svadhāpate madaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:764: RV_6,044.03a yena vṛddho na śavasā turo na svābhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:765: RV_6,044.03c somaḥ sutaḥ sa indra te 'sti svadhāpate madaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:766: RV_6,044.04a tyam u vo aprahaṇaṃ gṛṇīṣe śavasas patim |
GV01rv_hn06u:767: RV_6,044.04c indraṃ viśvāsāhaṃ naram maṃhiṣṭhaṃ viśvacarṣaṇim ||
GV01rv_hn06u:768: RV_6,044.05a yaṃ vardhayantīd giraḥ patiṃ turasya rādhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:769: RV_6,044.05c tam in nv asya rodasī devī śuṣmaṃ saparyataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:771: RV_6,044.06c vipo na yasyotayo vi yad rohanti sakṣitaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:772: RV_6,044.07a avidad dakṣam mitro navīyān papāno devebhyo vasyo acait |
GV01rv_hn06u:773: RV_6,044.07c sasavān staulābhir dhautarībhir uruṣyā pāyur abhavat sakhibhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:774: RV_6,044.08a ṛtasya pathi vedhā apāyi śriye manāṃsi devāso akran |
GV01rv_hn06u:775: RV_6,044.08c dadhāno nāma maho vacobhir vapur dṛśaye venyo vy āvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:776: RV_6,044.09a dyumattamaṃ dakṣaṃ dhehy asme sedhā janānām pūrvīr arātīḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:777: RV_6,044.09c varṣīyo vayaḥ kṛṇuhi śacībhir dhanasya sātāv asmāṃ aviḍḍhi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:778: RV_6,044.10a indra tubhyam in maghavann abhūma vayaṃ dātre harivo mā vi venaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:779: RV_6,044.10c nakir āpir dadṛśe martyatrā kim aṅga radhracodanaṃ tvāhuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:780: RV_6,044.11a mā jasvane vṛṣabha no rarīthā mā te revataḥ sakhye riṣāma |
GV01rv_hn06u:781: RV_6,044.11c pūrvīṣ ṭa indra niṣṣidho janeṣu jahy asuṣvīn pra vṛhāpṛṇataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:782: RV_6,044.12a ud abhrāṇīva stanayann iyartīndro rādhāṃsy aśvyāni gavyā |
GV01rv_hn06u:783: RV_6,044.12c tvam asi pradivaḥ kārudhāyā mā tvādāmāna ā dabhan maghonaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:784: RV_6,044.13a adhvaryo vīra pra mahe sutānām indrāya bhara sa hy asya rājā |
GV01rv_hn06u:785: RV_6,044.13c yaḥ pūrvyābhir uta nūtanābhir gīrbhir vāvṛdhe gṛṇatām ṛṣīṇām ||
GV01rv_hn06u:786: RV_6,044.14a asya made puru varpāṃsi vidvān indro vṛtrāṇy apratī jaghāna |
GV01rv_hn06u:787: RV_6,044.14c tam u pra hoṣi madhumantam asmai somaṃ vīrāya śipriṇe pibadhyai ||
GV01rv_hn06u:788: RV_6,044.15a pātā sutam indro astu somaṃ hantā vṛtraṃ vajreṇa mandasānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:789: RV_6,044.15c gantā yajñam parāvataś cid acchā vasur dhīnām avitā kārudhāyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:790: RV_6,044.16a idaṃ tyat pātram indrapānam indrasya priyam amṛtam apāyi |
GV01rv_hn06u:791: RV_6,044.16c matsad yathā saumanasāya devaṃ vy asmad dveṣo yuyavad vy aṃhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:792: RV_6,044.17a enā mandāno jahi śūra śatrūñ jāmim ajāmim maghavann amitrān |
GV01rv_hn06u:793: RV_6,044.17c abhiṣeṇāṃ abhy ādediśānān parāca indra pra mṛṇā jahī ca ||
GV01rv_hn06u:794: RV_6,044.18a āsu ṣmā ṇo maghavann indra pṛtsv asmabhyam mahi varivaḥ sugaṃ kaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:795: RV_6,044.18c apāṃ tokasya tanayasya jeṣa indra sūrīn kṛṇuhi smā no ardham ||
GV01rv_hn06u:796: RV_6,044.19a ā tvā harayo vṛṣaṇo yujānā vṛṣarathāso vṛṣaraśmayo 'tyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:797: RV_6,044.19c asmatrāñco vṛṣaṇo vajravāho vṛṣṇe madāya suyujo vahantu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:798: RV_6,044.20a ā te vṛṣan vṛṣaṇo droṇam asthur ghṛtapruṣo normayo madantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:799: RV_6,044.20c indra pra tubhyaṃ vṛṣabhiḥ sutānāṃ vṛṣṇe bharanti vṛṣabhāya somam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:800: RV_6,044.21a vṛṣāsi divo vṛṣabhaḥ pṛthivyā vṛṣā sindhūnāṃ vṛṣabha stiyānām |
GV01rv_hn06u:801: RV_6,044.21c vṛṣṇe ta indur vṛṣabha pīpāya svādū raso madhupeyo varāya ||
GV01rv_hn06u:802: RV_6,044.22a ayaṃ devaḥ sahasā jāyamāna indreṇa yujā paṇim astabhāyat |
GV01rv_hn06u:803: RV_6,044.22c ayaṃ svasya pitur āyudhānīndur amuṣṇād aśivasya māyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:804: RV_6,044.23a ayam akṛṇod uṣasaḥ supatnīr ayaṃ sūrye adadhāj jyotir antaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:805: RV_6,044.23c ayaṃ tridhātu divi rocaneṣu triteṣu vindad amṛtaṃ nigūḷham ||
GV01rv_hn06u:806: RV_6,044.24a ayaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī vi ṣkabhāyad ayaṃ ratham ayunak saptaraśmim |
GV01rv_hn06u:807: RV_6,044.24c ayaṃ goṣu śacyā pakvam antaḥ somo dādhāra daśayantram utsam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:808: RV_6,045.01a ya ānayat parāvataḥ sunītī turvaśaṃ yadum |
GV01rv_hn06u:809: RV_6,045.01c indraḥ sa no yuvā sakhā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:810: RV_6,045.02a avipre cid vayo dadhad anāśunā cid arvatā |
GV01rv_hn06u:812: RV_6,045.03a mahīr asya praṇītayaḥ pūrvīr uta praśastayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:814: RV_6,045.04a sakhāyo brahmavāhase 'rcata pra ca gāyata |
GV01rv_hn06u:815: RV_6,045.04c sa hi naḥ pramatir mahī ||
GV01rv_hn06u:816: RV_6,045.05a tvam ekasya vṛtrahann avitā dvayor asi |
GV01rv_hn06u:818: RV_6,045.06a nayasīd v ati dviṣaḥ kṛṇoṣy ukthaśaṃsinaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:820: RV_6,045.07a brahmāṇam brahmavāhasaṃ gīrbhiḥ sakhāyam ṛgmiyam |
GV01rv_hn06u:822: RV_6,045.08a yasya viśvāni hastayor ūcur vasūni ni dvitā |
GV01rv_hn06u:824: RV_6,045.09a vi dṛḷhāni cid adrivo janānāṃ śacīpate |
GV01rv_hn06u:826: RV_6,045.10a tam u tvā satya somapā indra vājānām pate |
GV01rv_hn06u:828: RV_6,045.11a tam u tvā yaḥ purāsitha yo vā nūnaṃ hite dhane |
GV01rv_hn06u:830: RV_6,045.12a dhībhir arvadbhir arvato vājāṃ indra śravāyyān |
GV01rv_hn06u:832: RV_6,045.13a abhūr u vīra girvaṇo mahāṃ indra dhane hite |
GV01rv_hn06u:834: RV_6,045.14a yā ta ūtir amitrahan makṣūjavastamāsati |
GV01rv_hn06u:838: RV_6,045.16a ya eka it tam u ṣṭuhi kṛṣṭīnāṃ vicarṣaṇiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:840: RV_6,045.17a yo gṛṇatām id āsithāpir ūtī śivaḥ sakhā |
GV01rv_hn06u:841: RV_6,045.17c sa tvaṃ na indra mṛḷaya ||
GV01rv_hn06u:842: RV_6,045.18a dhiṣva vajraṃ gabhastyo rakṣohatyāya vajrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:844: RV_6,045.19a pratnaṃ rayīṇāṃ yujaṃ sakhāyaṃ kīricodanam |
GV01rv_hn06u:846: RV_6,045.20a sa hi viśvāni pārthivāṃ eko vasūni patyate |
GV01rv_hn06u:848: RV_6,045.21a sa no niyudbhir ā pṛṇa kāmaṃ vājebhir aśvibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:850: RV_6,045.22a tad vo gāya sute sacā puruhūtāya satvane |
GV01rv_hn06u:851: RV_6,045.22c śaṃ yad gave na śākine ||
GV01rv_hn06u:852: RV_6,045.23a na ghā vasur ni yamate dānaṃ vājasya gomataḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:853: RV_6,045.23c yat sīm upa śravad giraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:854: RV_6,045.24a kuvitsasya pra hi vrajaṃ gomantaṃ dasyuhā gamat |
GV01rv_hn06u:856: RV_6,045.25a imā u tvā śatakrato 'bhi pra ṇonuvur giraḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:858: RV_6,045.26a dūṇāśaṃ sakhyaṃ tava gaur asi vīra gavyate |
GV01rv_hn06u:860: RV_6,045.27a sa mandasvā hy andhaso rādhase tanvā mahe |
GV01rv_hn06u:862: RV_6,045.28a imā u tvā sute-sute nakṣante girvaṇo giraḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:866: RV_6,045.30a asmākam indra bhūtu te stomo vāhiṣṭho antamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:868: RV_6,045.31a adhi bṛbuḥ paṇīnāṃ varṣiṣṭhe mūrdhann asthāt |
GV01rv_hn06u:870: RV_6,045.32a yasya vāyor iva dravad bhadrā rātiḥ sahasriṇī |
GV01rv_hn06u:872: RV_6,045.33a tat su no viśve arya ā sadā gṛṇanti kāravaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:874: RV_6,046.01a tvām id dhi havāmahe sātā vājasya kāravaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:875: RV_6,046.01c tvāṃ vṛtreṣv indra satpatiṃ naras tvāṃ kāṣṭhāsv arvataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:876: RV_6,046.02a sa tvaṃ naś citra vajrahasta dhṛṣṇuyā maha stavāno adrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:877: RV_6,046.02c gām aśvaṃ rathyam indra saṃ kira satrā vājaṃ na jigyuṣe ||
GV01rv_hn06u:878: RV_6,046.03a yaḥ satrāhā vicarṣaṇir indraṃ taṃ hūmahe vayam |
GV01rv_hn06u:879: RV_6,046.03c sahasramuṣka tuvinṛmṇa satpate bhavā samatsu no vṛdhe ||
GV01rv_hn06u:880: RV_6,046.04a bādhase janān vṛṣabheva manyunā ghṛṣau mīḷha ṛcīṣama |
GV01rv_hn06u:881: RV_6,046.04c asmākam bodhy avitā mahādhane tanūṣv apsu sūrye ||
GV01rv_hn06u:882: RV_6,046.05a indra jyeṣṭhaṃ na ā bharaṃ ojiṣṭham papuri śravaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:883: RV_6,046.05c yeneme citra vajrahasta rodasī obhe suśipra prāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:884: RV_6,046.06a tvām ugram avase carṣaṇīsahaṃ rājan deveṣu hūmahe |
GV01rv_hn06u:885: RV_6,046.06c viśvā su no vithurā pibdanā vaso 'mitrān suṣahān kṛdhi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:886: RV_6,046.07a yad indra nāhuṣīṣv āṃ ojo nṛmṇaṃ ca kṛṣṭiṣu |
GV01rv_hn06u:887: RV_6,046.07c yad vā pañca kṣitīnāṃ dyumnam ā bhara satrā viśvāni pauṃsyā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:888: RV_6,046.08a yad vā tṛkṣau maghavan druhyāv ā jane yat pūrau kac ca vṛṣṇyam |
GV01rv_hn06u:889: RV_6,046.08c asmabhyaṃ tad rirīhi saṃ nṛṣāhye 'mitrān pṛtsu turvaṇe ||
GV01rv_hn06u:890: RV_6,046.09a indra tridhātu śaraṇaṃ trivarūthaṃ svastimat |
GV01rv_hn06u:891: RV_6,046.09c chardir yaccha maghavadbhyaś ca mahyaṃ ca yāvayā didyum ebhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:892: RV_6,046.10a ye gavyatā manasā śatrum ādabhur abhipraghnanti dhṛṣṇuyā |
GV01rv_hn06u:893: RV_6,046.10c adha smā no maghavann indra girvaṇas tanūpā antamo bhava ||
GV01rv_hn06u:894: RV_6,046.11a adha smā no vṛdhe bhavendra nāyam avā yudhi |
GV01rv_hn06u:895: RV_6,046.11c yad antarikṣe patayanti parṇino didyavas tigmamūrdhānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:896: RV_6,046.12a yatra śūrāsas tanvo vitanvate priyā śarma pitṝṇām |
GV01rv_hn06u:897: RV_6,046.12c adha smā yaccha tanve tane ca chardir acittaṃ yāvaya dveṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:898: RV_6,046.13a yad indra sarge arvataś codayāse mahādhane |
GV01rv_hn06u:899: RV_6,046.13c asamane adhvani vṛjine pathi śyenāṃ iva śravasyataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:900: RV_6,046.14a sindhūṃr iva pravaṇa āśuyā yato yadi klośam anu ṣvaṇi |
GV01rv_hn06u:901: RV_6,046.14c ā ye vayo na varvṛtaty āmiṣi gṛbhītā bāhvor gavi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:902: RV_6,047.01a svāduṣ kilāyam madhumāṃ utāyaṃ tīvraḥ kilāyaṃ rasavāṃ utāyam |
GV01rv_hn06u:903: RV_6,047.01c uto nv asya papivāṃsam indraṃ na kaś cana sahata āhaveṣu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:904: RV_6,047.02a ayaṃ svādur iha madiṣṭha āsa yasyendro vṛtrahatye mamāda |
GV01rv_hn06u:905: RV_6,047.02c purūṇi yaś cyautnā śambarasya vi navatiṃ nava ca dehyo han ||
GV01rv_hn06u:906: RV_6,047.03a ayam me pīta ud iyarti vācam ayam manīṣām uśatīm ajīgaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:907: RV_6,047.03c ayaṃ ṣaḷ urvīr amimīta dhīro na yābhyo bhuvanaṃ kac canāre ||
GV01rv_hn06u:908: RV_6,047.04a ayaṃ sa yo varimāṇam pṛthivyā varṣmāṇaṃ divo akṛṇod ayaṃ saḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:909: RV_6,047.04c ayam pīyūṣaṃ tisṛṣu pravatsu somo dādhārorv antarikṣam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:910: RV_6,047.05a ayaṃ vidac citradṛśīkam arṇaḥ śukrasadmanām uṣasām anīke |
GV01rv_hn06u:911: RV_6,047.05c ayam mahān mahatā skambhanenod dyām astabhnād vṛṣabho marutvān ||
GV01rv_hn06u:912: RV_6,047.06a dhṛṣat piba kalaśe somam indra vṛtrahā śūra samare vasūnām |
GV01rv_hn06u:913: RV_6,047.06c mādhyandine savana ā vṛṣasva rayisthāno rayim asmāsu dhehi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:914: RV_6,047.07a indra pra ṇaḥ puraeteva paśya pra no naya prataraṃ vasyo accha |
GV01rv_hn06u:915: RV_6,047.07c bhavā supāro atipārayo no bhavā sunītir uta vāmanītiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:916: RV_6,047.08a uruṃ no lokam anu neṣi vidvān svarvaj jyotir abhayaṃ svasti |
GV01rv_hn06u:917: RV_6,047.08c ṛṣvā ta indra sthavirasya bāhū upa stheyāma śaraṇā bṛhantā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:918: RV_6,047.09a variṣṭhe na indra vandhure dhā vahiṣṭhayoḥ śatāvann aśvayor ā |
GV01rv_hn06u:919: RV_6,047.09c iṣam ā vakṣīṣāṃ varṣiṣṭhām mā nas tārīn maghavan rāyo aryaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:920: RV_6,047.10a indra mṛḷa mahyaṃ jīvātum iccha codaya dhiyam ayaso na dhārām |
GV01rv_hn06u:921: RV_6,047.10c yat kiṃ cāhaṃ tvāyur idaṃ vadāmi taj juṣasva kṛdhi mā devavantam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:922: RV_6,047.11a trātāram indram avitāram indraṃ have-have suhavaṃ śūram indram |
GV01rv_hn06u:923: RV_6,047.11c hvayāmi śakram puruhūtam indraṃ svasti no maghavā dhātv indraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:924: RV_6,047.12a indraḥ sutrāmā svavāṃ avobhiḥ sumṛḷīko bhavatu viśvavedāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:925: RV_6,047.12c bādhatāṃ dveṣo abhayaṃ kṛṇotu suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma ||
GV01rv_hn06u:926: RV_6,047.13a tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyāpi bhadre saumanase syāma |
GV01rv_hn06u:927: RV_6,047.13c sa sutrāmā svavāṃ indro asme ārāc cid dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyotu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:928: RV_6,047.14a ava tve indra pravato normir giro brahmāṇi niyuto dhavante |
GV01rv_hn06u:929: RV_6,047.14c urū na rādhaḥ savanā purūṇy apo gā vajrin yuvase sam indūn ||
GV01rv_hn06u:930: RV_6,047.15a ka īṃ stavat kaḥ pṛṇāt ko yajāte yad ugram in maghavā viśvahāvet |
GV01rv_hn06u:931: RV_6,047.15c pādāv iva praharann anyam-anyaṃ kṛṇoti pūrvam aparaṃ śacībhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:932: RV_6,047.16a śṛṇve vīra ugram-ugraṃ damāyann anyam-anyam atinenīyamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:933: RV_6,047.16c edhamānadviḷ ubhayasya rājā coṣkūyate viśa indro manuṣyān ||
GV01rv_hn06u:934: RV_6,047.17a parā pūrveṣāṃ sakhyā vṛṇakti vitarturāṇo aparebhir eti |
GV01rv_hn06u:935: RV_6,047.17c anānubhūtīr avadhūnvānaḥ pūrvīr indraḥ śaradas tartarīti ||
GV01rv_hn06u:936: RV_6,047.18a rūpaṃ-rūpam pratirūpo babhūva tad asya rūpam praticakṣaṇāya |
GV01rv_hn06u:937: RV_6,047.18c indro māyābhiḥ pururūpa īyate yuktā hy asya harayaḥ śatā daśa ||
GV01rv_hn06u:938: RV_6,047.19a yujāno haritā rathe bhūri tvaṣṭeha rājati |
GV01rv_hn06u:939: RV_6,047.19c ko viśvāhā dviṣataḥ pakṣa āsata utāsīneṣu sūriṣu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:940: RV_6,047.20a agavyūti kṣetram āganma devā urvī satī bhūmir aṃhūraṇābhūt |
GV01rv_hn06u:941: RV_6,047.20c bṛhaspate pra cikitsā gaviṣṭāv itthā sate jaritra indra panthām ||
GV01rv_hn06u:942: RV_6,047.21a dive-dive sadṛśīr anyam ardhaṃ kṛṣṇā asedhad apa sadmano jāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:943: RV_6,047.21c ahan dāsā vṛṣabho vasnayantodavraje varcinaṃ śambaraṃ ca ||
GV01rv_hn06u:944: RV_6,047.22a prastoka in nu rādhasas ta indra daśa kośayīr daśa vājino 'dāt |
GV01rv_hn06u:945: RV_6,047.22c divodāsād atithigvasya rādhaḥ śāmbaraṃ vasu praty agrabhīṣma ||
GV01rv_hn06u:946: RV_6,047.23a daśāśvān daśa kośān daśa vastrādhibhojanā |
GV01rv_hn06u:948: RV_6,047.24a daśa rathān praṣṭimataḥ śataṃ gā atharvabhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:950: RV_6,047.25a mahi rādho viśvajanyaṃ dadhānān bharadvājān sārñjayo abhy ayaṣṭa ||
GV01rv_hn06u:951: RV_6,047.26a vanaspate vīḍvaṅgo hi bhūyā asmatsakhā prataraṇaḥ suvīraḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:952: RV_6,047.26c gobhiḥ saṃnaddho asi vīḷayasvāsthātā te jayatu jetvāni ||
GV01rv_hn06u:953: RV_6,047.27a divas pṛthivyāḥ pary oja udbhṛtaṃ vanaspatibhyaḥ pary ābhṛtaṃ sahaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:954: RV_6,047.27c apām ojmānam pari gobhir āvṛtam indrasya vajraṃ haviṣā rathaṃ yaja ||
GV01rv_hn06u:955: RV_6,047.28a indrasya vajro marutām anīkam mitrasya garbho varuṇasya nābhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:956: RV_6,047.28c semāṃ no havyadātiṃ juṣāṇo deva ratha prati havyā gṛbhāya ||
GV01rv_hn06u:957: RV_6,047.29a upa śvāsaya pṛthivīm uta dyām purutrā te manutāṃ viṣṭhitaṃ jagat |
GV01rv_hn06u:958: RV_6,047.29c sa dundubhe sajūr indreṇa devair dūrād davīyo apa sedha śatrūn ||
GV01rv_hn06u:959: RV_6,047.30a ā krandaya balam ojo na ā dhā ni ṣṭanihi duritā bādhamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:960: RV_6,047.30c apa protha dundubhe ducchunā ita indrasya muṣṭir asi vīḷayasva ||
GV01rv_hn06u:961: RV_6,047.31a āmūr aja pratyāvartayemāḥ ketumad dundubhir vāvadīti |
GV01rv_hn06u:962: RV_6,047.31c sam aśvaparṇāś caranti no naro 'smākam indra rathino jayantu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:963: RV_6,048.01a yajñā-yajñā vo agnaye girā-girā ca dakṣase |
GV01rv_hn06u:964: RV_6,048.01c pra-pra vayam amṛtaṃ jātavedasam priyam mitraṃ na śaṃsiṣam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:965: RV_6,048.02a ūrjo napātaṃ sa hināyam asmayur dāśema havyadātaye |
GV01rv_hn06u:966: RV_6,048.02c bhuvad vājeṣv avitā bhuvad vṛdha uta trātā tanūnām ||
