GV01rv_hn06u:967: RV_6,048.03a vṛṣā hy agne ajaro mahān vibhāsy arciṣā |
GV01rv_hn06u:968: RV_6,048.03c ajasreṇa śociṣā śośucac chuce sudītibhiḥ su dīdihi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:969: RV_6,048.04a maho devān yajasi yakṣy ānuṣak tava kratvota daṃsanā |
GV01rv_hn06u:970: RV_6,048.04c arvācaḥ sīṃ kṛṇuhy agne 'vase rāsva vājota vaṃsva ||
GV01rv_hn06u:971: RV_6,048.05a yam āpo adrayo vanā garbham ṛtasya piprati |
GV01rv_hn06u:972: RV_6,048.05c sahasā yo mathito jāyate nṛbhiḥ pṛthivyā adhi sānavi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:973: RV_6,048.06a ā yaḥ paprau bhānunā rodasī ubhe dhūmena dhāvate divi |
GV01rv_hn06u:974: RV_6,048.06c tiras tamo dadṛśa ūrmyāsv ā śyāvāsv aruṣo vṛṣā śyāvā aruṣo vṛṣā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:975: RV_6,048.07a bṛhadbhir agne arcibhiḥ śukreṇa deva śociṣā |
GV01rv_hn06u:976: RV_6,048.07c bharadvāje samidhāno yaviṣṭhya revan naḥ śukra dīdihi dyumat pāvaka dīdihi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:977: RV_6,048.08a viśvāsāṃ gṛhapatir viśām asi tvam agne mānuṣīṇām |
GV01rv_hn06u:978: RV_6,048.08c śatam pūrbhir yaviṣṭha pāhy aṃhasaḥ sameddhāraṃ śataṃ himā stotṛbhyo ye ca dadati ||
GV01rv_hn06u:979: RV_6,048.09a tvaṃ naś citra ūtyā vaso rādhāṃsi codaya |
GV01rv_hn06u:980: RV_6,048.09c asya rāyas tvam agne rathīr asi vidā gādhaṃ tuce tu naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:981: RV_6,048.10a parṣi tokaṃ tanayam partṛbhiṣ ṭvam adabdhair aprayutvabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:982: RV_6,048.10c agne heḷāṃsi daivyā yuyodhi no 'devāni hvarāṃsi ca ||
GV01rv_hn06u:983: RV_6,048.11a ā sakhāyaḥ sabardughāṃ dhenum ajadhvam upa navyasā vacaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:985: RV_6,048.12a yā śardhāya mārutāya svabhānave śravo 'mṛtyu dhukṣata |
GV01rv_hn06u:986: RV_6,048.12c yā mṛḷīke marutāṃ turāṇāṃ yā sumnair evayāvarī ||
GV01rv_hn06u:988: RV_6,048.13b dhenuṃ ca viśvadohasam iṣaṃ ca viśvabhojasam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:989: RV_6,048.14a taṃ va indraṃ na sukratuṃ varuṇam iva māyinam |
GV01rv_hn06u:990: RV_6,048.14c aryamaṇaṃ na mandraṃ sṛprabhojasaṃ viṣṇuṃ na stuṣa ādiśe ||
GV01rv_hn06u:991: RV_6,048.15a tveṣaṃ śardho na mārutaṃ tuviṣvaṇy anarvāṇam pūṣaṇaṃ saṃ yathā śatā |
GV01rv_hn06u:992: RV_6,048.15c saṃ sahasrā kāriṣac carṣaṇibhya āṃ āvir gūḷhā vasū karat suvedā no vasū karat ||
GV01rv_hn06u:993: RV_6,048.16a ā mā pūṣann upa drava śaṃsiṣaṃ nu te apikarṇa āghṛṇe |
GV01rv_hn06u:995: RV_6,048.17a mā kākambīram ud vṛho vanaspatim aśastīr vi hi nīnaśaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:996: RV_6,048.17c mota sūro aha evā cana grīvā ādadhate veḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:997: RV_6,048.18a dṛter iva te 'vṛkam astu sakhyam |
GV01rv_hn06u:999: RV_6,048.19a paro hi martyair asi samo devair uta śriyā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1000: RV_6,048.19c abhi khyaḥ pūṣan pṛtanāsu nas tvam avā nūnaṃ yathā purā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1001: RV_6,048.20a vāmī vāmasya dhūtayaḥ praṇītir astu sūnṛtā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1002: RV_6,048.20c devasya vā maruto martyasya vejānasya prayajyavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1003: RV_6,048.21a sadyaś cid yasya carkṛtiḥ pari dyāṃ devo naiti sūryaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1004: RV_6,048.21c tveṣaṃ śavo dadhire nāma yajñiyam maruto vṛtrahaṃ śavo jyeṣṭhaṃ vṛtrahaṃ śavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1005: RV_6,048.22a sakṛd dha dyaur ajāyata sakṛd bhūmir ajāyata |
GV01rv_hn06u:1006: RV_6,048.22c pṛśnyā dugdhaṃ sakṛt payas tad anyo nānu jāyate ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1007: RV_6,049.01a stuṣe janaṃ suvrataṃ navyasībhir gīrbhir mitrāvaruṇā sumnayantā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1008: RV_6,049.01c ta ā gamantu ta iha śruvantu sukṣatrāso varuṇo mitro agniḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1009: RV_6,049.02a viśo-viśa īḍyam adhvareṣv adṛptakratum aratiṃ yuvatyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1010: RV_6,049.02c divaḥ śiśuṃ sahasaḥ sūnum agniṃ yajñasya ketum aruṣaṃ yajadhyai ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1011: RV_6,049.03a aruṣasya duhitarā virūpe stṛbhir anyā pipiśe sūro anyā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1012: RV_6,049.03c mithasturā vicarantī pāvake manma śrutaṃ nakṣata ṛcyamāne ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1013: RV_6,049.04a pra vāyum acchā bṛhatī manīṣā bṛhadrayiṃ viśvavāraṃ rathaprām |
GV01rv_hn06u:1014: RV_6,049.04c dyutadyāmā niyutaḥ patyamānaḥ kaviḥ kavim iyakṣasi prayajyo ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1015: RV_6,049.05a sa me vapuś chadayad aśvinor yo ratho virukmān manasā yujānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1016: RV_6,049.05c yena narā nāsatyeṣayadhyai vartir yāthas tanayāya tmane ca ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1017: RV_6,049.06a parjanyavātā vṛṣabhā pṛthivyāḥ purīṣāṇi jinvatam apyāni |
GV01rv_hn06u:1018: RV_6,049.06c satyaśrutaḥ kavayo yasya gīrbhir jagata sthātar jagad ā kṛṇudhvam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1019: RV_6,049.07a pāvīravī kanyā citrāyuḥ sarasvatī vīrapatnī dhiyaṃ dhāt |
GV01rv_hn06u:1020: RV_6,049.07c gnābhir acchidraṃ śaraṇaṃ sajoṣā durādharṣaṃ gṛṇate śarma yaṃsat ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1021: RV_6,049.08a pathas-pathaḥ paripatiṃ vacasyā kāmena kṛto abhy ānaḷ arkam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1022: RV_6,049.08c sa no rāsac churudhaś candrāgrā dhiyaṃ-dhiyaṃ sīṣadhāti pra pūṣā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1023: RV_6,049.09a prathamabhājaṃ yaśasaṃ vayodhāṃ supāṇiṃ devaṃ sugabhastim ṛbhvam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1024: RV_6,049.09c hotā yakṣad yajatam pastyānām agnis tvaṣṭāraṃ suhavaṃ vibhāvā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1025: RV_6,049.10a bhuvanasya pitaraṃ gīrbhir ābhī rudraṃ divā vardhayā rudram aktau |
GV01rv_hn06u:1026: RV_6,049.10c bṛhantam ṛṣvam ajaraṃ suṣumnam ṛdhag ghuvema kavineṣitāsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1027: RV_6,049.11a ā yuvānaḥ kavayo yajñiyāso maruto ganta gṛṇato varasyām |
GV01rv_hn06u:1028: RV_6,049.11c acitraṃ cid dhi jinvathā vṛdhanta itthā nakṣanto naro aṅgirasvat ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1029: RV_6,049.12a pra vīrāya pra tavase turāyājā yūtheva paśurakṣir astam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1030: RV_6,049.12c sa pispṛśati tanvi śrutasya stṛbhir na nākaṃ vacanasya vipaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1031: RV_6,049.13a yo rajāṃsi vimame pārthivāni triś cid viṣṇur manave bādhitāya |
GV01rv_hn06u:1032: RV_6,049.13c tasya te śarmann upadadyamāne rāyā madema tanvā tanā ca ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1033: RV_6,049.14a tan no 'hir budhnyo adbhir arkais tat parvatas tat savitā cano dhāt |
GV01rv_hn06u:1034: RV_6,049.14c tad oṣadhībhir abhi rātiṣāco bhagaḥ purandhir jinvatu pra rāye ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1035: RV_6,049.15a nu no rayiṃ rathyaṃ carṣaṇiprām puruvīram maha ṛtasya gopām |
GV01rv_hn06u:1036: RV_6,049.15c kṣayaṃ dātājaraṃ yena janān spṛdho adevīr abhi ca kramāma viśa ādevīr abhy aśnavāma ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1037: RV_6,050.01a huve vo devīm aditiṃ namobhir mṛḷīkāya varuṇam mitram agnim |
GV01rv_hn06u:1038: RV_6,050.01c abhikṣadām aryamaṇaṃ suśevaṃ trātṝn devān savitāram bhagaṃ ca ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1039: RV_6,050.02a sujyotiṣaḥ sūrya dakṣapitṝn anāgāstve sumaho vīhi devān |
GV01rv_hn06u:1040: RV_6,050.02c dvijanmāno ya ṛtasāpaḥ satyāḥ svarvanto yajatā agnijihvāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1041: RV_6,050.03a uta dyāvāpṛthivī kṣatram uru bṛhad rodasī śaraṇaṃ suṣumne |
GV01rv_hn06u:1042: RV_6,050.03c mahas karatho varivo yathā no 'sme kṣayāya dhiṣaṇe anehaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1043: RV_6,050.04a ā no rudrasya sūnavo namantām adyā hūtāso vasavo 'dhṛṣṭāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1044: RV_6,050.04c yad īm arbhe mahati vā hitāso bādhe maruto ahvāma devān ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1045: RV_6,050.05a mimyakṣa yeṣu rodasī nu devī siṣakti pūṣā abhyardhayajvā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1046: RV_6,050.05c śrutvā havam maruto yad dha yātha bhūmā rejante adhvani pravikte ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1047: RV_6,050.06a abhi tyaṃ vīraṃ girvaṇasam arcendram brahmaṇā jaritar navena |
GV01rv_hn06u:1048: RV_6,050.06c śravad id dhavam upa ca stavāno rāsad vājāṃ upa maho gṛṇānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1049: RV_6,050.07a omānam āpo mānuṣīr amṛktaṃ dhāta tokāya tanayāya śaṃ yoḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1050: RV_6,050.07c yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā bhiṣajo mātṛtamā viśvasya sthātur jagato janitrīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1051: RV_6,050.08a ā no devaḥ savitā trāyamāṇo hiraṇyapāṇir yajato jagamyāt |
GV01rv_hn06u:1052: RV_6,050.08c yo datravāṃ uṣaso na pratīkaṃ vyūrṇute dāśuṣe vāryāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1053: RV_6,050.09a uta tvaṃ sūno sahaso no adyā devāṃ asminn adhvare vavṛtyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1054: RV_6,050.09c syām ahaṃ te sadam id rātau tava syām agne 'vasā suvīraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1055: RV_6,050.10a uta tyā me havam ā jagmyātaṃ nāsatyā dhībhir yuvam aṅga viprā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1056: RV_6,050.10c atriṃ na mahas tamaso 'mumuktaṃ tūrvataṃ narā duritād abhīke ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1057: RV_6,050.11a te no rāyo dyumato vājavato dātāro bhūta nṛvataḥ purukṣoḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1058: RV_6,050.11c daśasyanto divyāḥ pārthivāso gojātā apyā mṛḷatā ca devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1059: RV_6,050.12a te no rudraḥ sarasvatī sajoṣā mīḷhuṣmanto viṣṇur mṛḷantu vāyuḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1060: RV_6,050.12c ṛbhukṣā vājo daivyo vidhātā parjanyāvātā pipyatām iṣaṃ naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1061: RV_6,050.13a uta sya devaḥ savitā bhago no 'pāṃ napād avatu dānu papriḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1062: RV_6,050.13c tvaṣṭā devebhir janibhiḥ sajoṣā dyaur devebhiḥ pṛthivī samudraiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1063: RV_6,050.14a uta no 'hir budhnyaḥ śṛṇotv aja ekapāt pṛthivī samudraḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1064: RV_6,050.14c viśve devā ṛtāvṛdho huvānā stutā mantrāḥ kaviśastā avantu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1065: RV_6,050.15a evā napāto mama tasya dhībhir bharadvājā abhy arcanty arkaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1066: RV_6,050.15c gnā hutāso vasavo 'dhṛṣṭā viśve stutāso bhūtā yajatrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1067: RV_6,051.01a ud u tyac cakṣur mahi mitrayor āṃ eti priyaṃ varuṇayor adabdham |
GV01rv_hn06u:1068: RV_6,051.01c ṛtasya śuci darśatam anīkaṃ rukmo na diva uditā vy adyaut ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1069: RV_6,051.02a veda yas trīṇi vidathāny eṣāṃ devānāṃ janma sanutar ā ca vipraḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1070: RV_6,051.02c ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā ca paśyann abhi caṣṭe sūro arya evān ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1071: RV_6,051.03a stuṣa u vo maha ṛtasya gopān aditim mitraṃ varuṇaṃ sujātān |
GV01rv_hn06u:1072: RV_6,051.03c aryamaṇam bhagam adabdhadhītīn acchā voce sadhanyaḥ pāvakān ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1073: RV_6,051.04a riśādasaḥ satpatīṃr adabdhān maho rājñaḥ suvasanasya dātṝn |
GV01rv_hn06u:1074: RV_6,051.04c yūnaḥ sukṣatrān kṣayato divo nṝn ādityān yāmy aditiṃ duvoyu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1075: RV_6,051.05a dyauṣ pitaḥ pṛthivi mātar adhrug agne bhrātar vasavo mṛḷatā naḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1076: RV_6,051.05c viśva ādityā adite sajoṣā asmabhyaṃ śarma bahulaṃ vi yanta ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1077: RV_6,051.06a mā no vṛkāya vṛkye samasmā aghāyate rīradhatā yajatrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1078: RV_6,051.06c yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā rathyo nas tanūnāṃ yūyaṃ dakṣasya vacaso babhūva ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1079: RV_6,051.07a mā va eno anyakṛtam bhujema mā tat karma vasavo yac cayadhve |
GV01rv_hn06u:1080: RV_6,051.07c viśvasya hi kṣayatha viśvadevāḥ svayaṃ ripus tanvaṃ rīriṣīṣṭa ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1081: RV_6,051.08a nama id ugraṃ nama ā vivāse namo dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyām |
GV01rv_hn06u:1082: RV_6,051.08c namo devebhyo nama īśa eṣāṃ kṛtaṃ cid eno namasā vivāse ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1083: RV_6,051.09a ṛtasya vo rathyaḥ pūtadakṣān ṛtasya pastyasado adabdhān |
GV01rv_hn06u:1084: RV_6,051.09c tāṃ ā namobhir urucakṣaso nṝn viśvān va ā name maho yajatrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1085: RV_6,051.10a te hi śreṣṭhavarcasas ta u nas tiro viśvāni duritā nayanti |
GV01rv_hn06u:1086: RV_6,051.10c sukṣatrāso varuṇo mitro agnir ṛtadhītayo vakmarājasatyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1087: RV_6,051.11a te na indraḥ pṛthivī kṣāma vardhan pūṣā bhago aditiḥ pañca janāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1088: RV_6,051.11c suśarmāṇaḥ svavasaḥ sunīthā bhavantu naḥ sutrātrāsaḥ sugopāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1089: RV_6,051.12a nū sadmānaṃ divyaṃ naṃśi devā bhāradvājaḥ sumatiṃ yāti hotā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1090: RV_6,051.12c āsānebhir yajamāno miyedhair devānāṃ janma vasūyur vavanda ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1091: RV_6,051.13a apa tyaṃ vṛjinaṃ ripuṃ stenam agne durādhyam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1092: RV_6,051.13c daviṣṭham asya satpate kṛdhī sugam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1093: RV_6,051.14a grāvāṇaḥ soma no hi kaṃ sakhitvanāya vāvaśuḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1094: RV_6,051.14c jahī ny atriṇam paṇiṃ vṛko hi ṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1095: RV_6,051.15a yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā sudānava indrajyeṣṭhā abhidyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1096: RV_6,051.15c kartā no adhvann ā sugaṃ gopā amā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1097: RV_6,051.16a api panthām aganmahi svastigām anehasam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1098: RV_6,051.16c yena viśvāḥ pari dviṣo vṛṇakti vindate vasu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1099: RV_6,052.01a na tad divā na pṛthivyānu manye na yajñena nota śamībhir ābhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1100: RV_6,052.01c ubjantu taṃ subhvaḥ parvatāso ni hīyatām atiyājasya yaṣṭā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1101: RV_6,052.02a ati vā yo maruto manyate no brahma vā yaḥ kriyamāṇaṃ ninitsāt |
GV01rv_hn06u:1102: RV_6,052.02c tapūṃṣi tasmai vṛjināni santu brahmadviṣam abhi taṃ śocatu dyauḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1103: RV_6,052.03a kim aṅga tvā brahmaṇaḥ soma gopāṃ kim aṅga tvāhur abhiśastipāṃ naḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1104: RV_6,052.03c kim aṅga naḥ paśyasi nidyamānān brahmadviṣe tapuṣiṃ hetim asya ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1105: RV_6,052.04a avantu mām uṣaso jāyamānā avantu mā sindhavaḥ pinvamānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1106: RV_6,052.04c avantu mā parvatāso dhruvāso 'vantu mā pitaro devahūtau ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1107: RV_6,052.05a viśvadānīṃ sumanasaḥ syāma paśyema nu sūryam uccarantam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1108: RV_6,052.05c tathā karad vasupatir vasūnāṃ devāṃ ohāno 'vasāgamiṣṭhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1109: RV_6,052.06a indro nediṣṭham avasāgamiṣṭhaḥ sarasvatī sindhubhiḥ pinvamānā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1110: RV_6,052.06c parjanyo na oṣadhībhir mayobhur agniḥ suśaṃsaḥ suhavaḥ piteva ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1111: RV_6,052.07a viśve devāsa ā gata śṛṇutā ma imaṃ havam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1113: RV_6,052.08a yo vo devā ghṛtasnunā havyena pratibhūṣati |
GV01rv_hn06u:1115: RV_6,052.09a upa naḥ sūnavo giraḥ śṛṇvantv amṛtasya ye |
GV01rv_hn06u:1117: RV_6,052.10a viśve devā ṛtāvṛdha ṛtubhir havanaśrutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1119: RV_6,052.11a stotram indro marudgaṇas tvaṣṭṛmān mitro aryamā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1121: RV_6,052.12a imaṃ no agne adhvaraṃ hotar vayunaśo yaja |
GV01rv_hn06u:1123: RV_6,052.13a viśve devāḥ śṛṇutemaṃ havam me ye antarikṣe ya upa dyavi ṣṭha |
GV01rv_hn06u:1124: RV_6,052.13c ye agnijihvā uta vā yajatrā āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1125: RV_6,052.14a viśve devā mama śṛṇvantu yajñiyā ubhe rodasī apāṃ napāc ca manma |
GV01rv_hn06u:1126: RV_6,052.14c mā vo vacāṃsi paricakṣyāṇi vocaṃ sumneṣv id vo antamā madema ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1127: RV_6,052.15a ye ke ca jmā mahino ahimāyā divo jajñire apāṃ sadhasthe |
GV01rv_hn06u:1128: RV_6,052.15c te asmabhyam iṣaye viśvam āyuḥ kṣapa usrā varivasyantu devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1129: RV_6,052.16a agnīparjanyāv avataṃ dhiyam me 'smin have suhavā suṣṭutiṃ naḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1130: RV_6,052.16c iḷām anyo janayad garbham anyaḥ prajāvatīr iṣa ā dhattam asme ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1131: RV_6,052.17a stīrṇe barhiṣi samidhāne agnau sūktena mahā namasā vivāse |
GV01rv_hn06u:1132: RV_6,052.17c asmin no adya vidathe yajatrā viśve devā haviṣi mādayadhvam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1133: RV_6,053.01a vayam u tvā pathas pate rathaṃ na vājasātaye |
GV01rv_hn06u:1135: RV_6,053.02a abhi no naryaṃ vasu vīram prayatadakṣiṇam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1137: RV_6,053.03a aditsantaṃ cid āghṛṇe pūṣan dānāya codaya |
GV01rv_hn06u:1138: RV_6,053.03c paṇeś cid vi mradā manaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1139: RV_6,053.04a vi patho vājasātaye cinuhi vi mṛdho jahi |
GV01rv_hn06u:1141: RV_6,053.05a pari tṛndhi paṇīnām ārayā hṛdayā kave |
GV01rv_hn06u:1143: RV_6,053.06a vi pūṣann ārayā tuda paṇer iccha hṛdi priyam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1145: RV_6,053.07a ā rikha kikirā kṛṇu paṇīnāṃ hṛdayā kave |
GV01rv_hn06u:1147: RV_6,053.08a yām pūṣan brahmacodanīm ārām bibharṣy āghṛṇe |
GV01rv_hn06u:1148: RV_6,053.08c tayā samasya hṛdayam ā rikha kikirā kṛṇu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1149: RV_6,053.09a yā te aṣṭrā goopaśāghṛṇe paśusādhanī |
GV01rv_hn06u:1151: RV_6,053.10a uta no goṣaṇiṃ dhiyam aśvasāṃ vājasām uta |
GV01rv_hn06u:1153: RV_6,054.01a sam pūṣan viduṣā naya yo añjasānuśāsati |
GV01rv_hn06u:1155: RV_6,054.02a sam u pūṣṇā gamemahi yo gṛhāṃ abhiśāsati |
GV01rv_hn06u:1157: RV_6,054.03a pūṣṇaś cakraṃ na riṣyati na kośo 'va padyate |
GV01rv_hn06u:1159: RV_6,054.04a yo asmai haviṣāvidhan na tam pūṣāpi mṛṣyate |
GV01rv_hn06u:1161: RV_6,054.05a pūṣā gā anv etu naḥ pūṣā rakṣatv arvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1163: RV_6,054.06a pūṣann anu pra gā ihi yajamānasya sunvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1165: RV_6,054.07a mākir neśan mākīṃ riṣan mākīṃ saṃ śāri kevaṭe |
GV01rv_hn06u:1167: RV_6,054.08a śṛṇvantam pūṣaṇaṃ vayam iryam anaṣṭavedasam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1169: RV_6,054.09a pūṣan tava vrate vayaṃ na riṣyema kadā cana |
GV01rv_hn06u:1171: RV_6,054.10a pari pūṣā parastād dhastaṃ dadhātu dakṣiṇam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1173: RV_6,055.01a ehi vāṃ vimuco napād āghṛṇe saṃ sacāvahai |
GV01rv_hn06u:1175: RV_6,055.02a rathītamaṃ kapardinam īśānaṃ rādhaso mahaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1177: RV_6,055.03a rāyo dhārāsy āghṛṇe vaso rāśir ajāśva |
GV01rv_hn06u:1179: RV_6,055.04a pūṣaṇaṃ nv ajāśvam upa stoṣāma vājinam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1181: RV_6,055.05a mātur didhiṣum abravaṃ svasur jāraḥ śṛṇotu naḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1183: RV_6,055.06a ājāsaḥ pūṣaṇaṃ rathe niśṛmbhās te janaśriyam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1185: RV_6,056.01a ya enam ādideśati karambhād iti pūṣaṇam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1187: RV_6,056.02a uta ghā sa rathītamaḥ sakhyā satpatir yujā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1189: RV_6,056.03a utādaḥ paruṣe gavi sūraś cakraṃ hiraṇyayam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1191: RV_6,056.04a yad adya tvā puruṣṭuta bravāma dasra mantumaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1192: RV_6,056.04c tat su no manma sādhaya ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1193: RV_6,056.05a imaṃ ca no gaveṣaṇaṃ sātaye sīṣadho gaṇam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1195: RV_6,056.06a ā te svastim īmaha āreaghām upāvasum |
GV01rv_hn06u:1196: RV_6,056.06c adyā ca sarvatātaye śvaś ca sarvatātaye ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1197: RV_6,057.01a indrā nu pūṣaṇā vayaṃ sakhyāya svastaye |
GV01rv_hn06u:1199: RV_6,057.02a somam anya upāsadat pātave camvoḥ sutam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1201: RV_6,057.03a ajā anyasya vahnayo harī anyasya sambhṛtā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1203: RV_6,057.04a yad indro anayad rito mahīr apo vṛṣantamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1205: RV_6,057.05a tām pūṣṇaḥ sumatiṃ vayaṃ vṛkṣasya pra vayām iva |
GV01rv_hn06u:1207: RV_6,057.06a ut pūṣaṇaṃ yuvāmahe 'bhīśūṃr iva sārathiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1209: RV_6,058.01a śukraṃ te anyad yajataṃ te anyad viṣurūpe ahanī dyaur ivāsi |
GV01rv_hn06u:1210: RV_6,058.01c viśvā hi māyā avasi svadhāvo bhadrā te pūṣann iha rātir astu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1211: RV_6,058.02a ajāśvaḥ paśupā vājapastyo dhiyañjinvo bhuvane viśve arpitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1212: RV_6,058.02c aṣṭrām pūṣā śithirām udvarīvṛjat saṃcakṣāṇo bhuvanā deva īyate ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1213: RV_6,058.03a yās te pūṣan nāvo antaḥ samudre hiraṇyayīr antarikṣe caranti |
GV01rv_hn06u:1214: RV_6,058.03c tābhir yāsi dūtyāṃ sūryasya kāmena kṛta śrava icchamānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1215: RV_6,058.04a pūṣā subandhur diva ā pṛthivyā iḷas patir maghavā dasmavarcāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1216: RV_6,058.04c yaṃ devāso adaduḥ sūryāyai kāmena kṛtaṃ tavasaṃ svañcam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1217: RV_6,059.01a pra nu vocā suteṣu vāṃ vīryā yāni cakrathuḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1218: RV_6,059.01c hatāso vām pitaro devaśatrava indrāgnī jīvatho yuvam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1219: RV_6,059.02a baḷ itthā mahimā vām indrāgnī paniṣṭha ā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1220: RV_6,059.02c samāno vāṃ janitā bhrātarā yuvaṃ yamāv ihehamātarā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1221: RV_6,059.03a okivāṃsā sute sacāṃ aśvā saptī ivādane |
GV01rv_hn06u:1222: RV_6,059.03c indrā nv agnī avaseha vajriṇā vayaṃ devā havāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1223: RV_6,059.04a ya indrāgnī suteṣu vāṃ stavat teṣv ṛtāvṛdhā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1224: RV_6,059.04c joṣavākaṃ vadataḥ pajrahoṣiṇā na devā bhasathaś cana ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1225: RV_6,059.05a indrāgnī ko asya vāṃ devau martaś ciketati |
GV01rv_hn06u:1226: RV_6,059.05c viṣūco aśvān yuyujāna īyata ekaḥ samāna ā rathe ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1227: RV_6,059.06a indrāgnī apād iyam pūrvāgāt padvatībhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1228: RV_6,059.06c hitvī śiro jihvayā vāvadac carat triṃśat padā ny akramīt ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1229: RV_6,059.07a indrāgnī ā hi tanvate naro dhanvāni bāhvoḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1230: RV_6,059.07c mā no asmin mahādhane parā varktaṃ gaviṣṭiṣu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1231: RV_6,059.08a indrāgnī tapanti māghā aryo arātayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1232: RV_6,059.08c apa dveṣāṃsy ā kṛtaṃ yuyutaṃ sūryād adhi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1233: RV_6,059.09a indrāgnī yuvor api vasu divyāni pārthivā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1234: RV_6,059.09c ā na iha pra yacchataṃ rayiṃ viśvāyupoṣasam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1236: RV_6,059.10c viśvābhir gīrbhir ā gatam asya somasya pītaye ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1237: RV_6,060.01a śnathad vṛtram uta sanoti vājam indrā yo agnī sahurī saparyāt |
GV01rv_hn06u:1238: RV_6,060.01c irajyantā vasavyasya bhūreḥ sahastamā sahasā vājayantā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1239: RV_6,060.02a tā yodhiṣṭam abhi gā indra nūnam apaḥ svar uṣaso agna ūḷhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1240: RV_6,060.02c diśaḥ svar uṣasa indra citrā apo gā agne yuvase niyutvān ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1241: RV_6,060.03a ā vṛtrahaṇā vṛtrahabhiḥ śuṣmair indra yātaṃ namobhir agne arvāk |
GV01rv_hn06u:1242: RV_6,060.03c yuvaṃ rādhobhir akavebhir indrāgne asme bhavatam uttamebhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1243: RV_6,060.04a tā huve yayor idam papne viśvam purā kṛtam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1245: RV_6,060.05a ugrā vighaninā mṛdha indrāgnī havāmahe |
GV01rv_hn06u:1247: RV_6,060.06a hato vṛtrāṇy āryā hato dāsāni satpatī |
GV01rv_hn06u:1249: RV_6,060.07a indrāgnī yuvām ime 'bhi stomā anūṣata |
GV01rv_hn06u:1251: RV_6,060.08a yā vāṃ santi puruspṛho niyuto dāśuṣe narā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1253: RV_6,060.09a tābhir ā gacchataṃ naropedaṃ savanaṃ sutam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1255: RV_6,060.10a tam īḷiṣva yo arciṣā vanā viśvā pariṣvajat |
GV01rv_hn06u:1257: RV_6,060.11a ya iddha āvivāsati sumnam indrasya martyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1259: RV_6,060.12a tā no vājavatīr iṣa āśūn pipṛtam arvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1261: RV_6,060.13a ubhā vām indrāgnī āhuvadhyā ubhā rādhasaḥ saha mādayadhyai |
GV01rv_hn06u:1262: RV_6,060.13c ubhā dātārāv iṣāṃ rayīṇām ubhā vājasya sātaye huve vām ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1263: RV_6,060.14a ā no gavyebhir aśvyair vasavyair upa gacchatam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1264: RV_6,060.14c sakhāyau devau sakhyāya śambhuvendrāgnī tā havāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1265: RV_6,060.15a indrāgnī śṛṇutaṃ havaṃ yajamānasya sunvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1266: RV_6,060.15c vītaṃ havyāny ā gatam pibataṃ somyam madhu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1267: RV_6,061.01a iyam adadād rabhasam ṛṇacyutaṃ divodāsaṃ vadhryaśvāya dāśuṣe |
GV01rv_hn06u:1268: RV_6,061.01c yā śaśvantam ācakhādāvasam paṇiṃ tā te dātrāṇi taviṣā sarasvati ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1269: RV_6,061.02a iyaṃ śuṣmebhir bisakhā ivārujat sānu girīṇāṃ taviṣebhir ūrmibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1270: RV_6,061.02c pārāvataghnīm avase suvṛktibhiḥ sarasvatīm ā vivāsema dhītibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1271: RV_6,061.03a sarasvati devanido ni barhaya prajāṃ viśvasya bṛsayasya māyinaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1272: RV_6,061.03c uta kṣitibhyo 'vanīr avindo viṣam ebhyo asravo vājinīvati ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1273: RV_6,061.04a pra ṇo devī sarasvatī vājebhir vājinīvatī |
GV01rv_hn06u:1275: RV_6,061.05a yas tvā devi sarasvaty upabrūte dhane hite |
GV01rv_hn06u:1277: RV_6,061.06a tvaṃ devi sarasvaty avā vājeṣu vājini |
GV01rv_hn06u:1279: RV_6,061.07a uta syā naḥ sarasvatī ghorā hiraṇyavartaniḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1281: RV_6,061.08a yasyā ananto ahrutas tveṣaś cariṣṇur arṇavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1283: RV_6,061.09a sā no viśvā ati dviṣaḥ svasṝr anyā ṛtāvarī |
GV01rv_hn06u:1285: RV_6,061.10a uta naḥ priyā priyāsu saptasvasā sujuṣṭā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1287: RV_6,061.11a āpapruṣī pārthivāny uru rajo antarikṣam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1289: RV_6,061.12a triṣadhasthā saptadhātuḥ pañca jātā vardhayantī |
GV01rv_hn06u:1291: RV_6,061.13a pra yā mahimnā mahināsu cekite dyumnebhir anyā apasām apastamā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1292: RV_6,061.13c ratha iva bṛhatī vibhvane kṛtopastutyā cikituṣā sarasvatī ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1293: RV_6,061.14a sarasvaty abhi no neṣi vasyo māpa spharīḥ payasā mā na ā dhak |
GV01rv_hn06u:1294: RV_6,061.14c juṣasva naḥ sakhyā veśyā ca mā tvat kṣetrāṇy araṇāni ganma ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1295: RV_6,062.01a stuṣe narā divo asya prasantāśvinā huve jaramāṇo arkaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1296: RV_6,062.01c yā sadya usrā vyuṣi jmo antān yuyūṣataḥ pary urū varāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1297: RV_6,062.02a tā yajñam ā śucibhiś cakramāṇā rathasya bhānuṃ rurucū rajobhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1298: RV_6,062.02c purū varāṃsy amitā mimānāpo dhanvāny ati yātho ajrān ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1299: RV_6,062.03a tā ha tyad vartir yad aradhram ugretthā dhiya ūhathuḥ śaśvad aśvaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1300: RV_6,062.03c manojavebhir iṣiraiḥ śayadhyai pari vyathir dāśuṣo martyasya ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1301: RV_6,062.04a tā navyaso jaramāṇasya manmopa bhūṣato yuyujānasaptī |
GV01rv_hn06u:1302: RV_6,062.04c śubham pṛkṣam iṣam ūrjaṃ vahantā hotā yakṣat pratno adhrug yuvānā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1303: RV_6,062.05a tā valgū dasrā puruśākatamā pratnā navyasā vacasā vivāse |
GV01rv_hn06u:1304: RV_6,062.05c yā śaṃsate stuvate śambhaviṣṭhā babhūvatur gṛṇate citrarātī ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1305: RV_6,062.06a tā bhujyuṃ vibhir adbhyaḥ samudrāt tugrasya sūnum ūhathū rajobhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1306: RV_6,062.06c areṇubhir yojanebhir bhujantā patatribhir arṇaso nir upasthāt ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1307: RV_6,062.07a vi jayuṣā rathyā yātam adriṃ śrutaṃ havaṃ vṛṣaṇā vadhrimatyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1308: RV_6,062.07c daśasyantā śayave pipyathur gām iti cyavānā sumatim bhuraṇyū ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1309: RV_6,062.08a yad rodasī pradivo asti bhūmā heḷo devānām uta martyatrā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1310: RV_6,062.08c tad ādityā vasavo rudriyāso rakṣoyuje tapur aghaṃ dadhāta ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1311: RV_6,062.09a ya īṃ rājānāv ṛtuthā vidadhad rajaso mitro varuṇaś ciketat |
GV01rv_hn06u:1312: RV_6,062.09c gambhīrāya rakṣase hetim asya droghāya cid vacasa ānavāya ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1313: RV_6,062.10a antaraiś cakrais tanayāya vartir dyumatā yātaṃ nṛvatā rathena |
GV01rv_hn06u:1314: RV_6,062.10c sanutyena tyajasā martyasya vanuṣyatām api śīrṣā vavṛktam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1315: RV_6,062.11a ā paramābhir uta madhyamābhir niyudbhir yātam avamābhir arvāk |
GV01rv_hn06u:1316: RV_6,062.11c dṛḷhasya cid gomato vi vrajasya duro vartaṃ gṛṇate citrarātī ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1317: RV_6,063.01a kva tyā valgū puruhūtādya dūto na stomo 'vidan namasvān |
GV01rv_hn06u:1318: RV_6,063.01c ā yo arvāṅ nāsatyā vavarta preṣṭhā hy asatho asya manman ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1319: RV_6,063.02a aram me gantaṃ havanāyāsmai gṛṇānā yathā pibātho andhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1320: RV_6,063.02c pari ha tyad vartir yātho riṣo na yat paro nāntaras tuturyāt ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1321: RV_6,063.03a akāri vām andhaso varīmann astāri barhiḥ suprāyaṇatamam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1322: RV_6,063.03c uttānahasto yuvayur vavandā vāṃ nakṣanto adraya āñjan ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1323: RV_6,063.04a ūrdhvo vām agnir adhvareṣv asthāt pra rātir eti jūrṇinī ghṛtācī |
GV01rv_hn06u:1324: RV_6,063.04c pra hotā gūrtamanā urāṇo 'yukta yo nāsatyā havīman ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1325: RV_6,063.05a adhi śriye duhitā sūryasya rathaṃ tasthau purubhujā śatotim |
GV01rv_hn06u:1326: RV_6,063.05c pra māyābhir māyinā bhūtam atra narā nṛtū janiman yajñiyānām ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1327: RV_6,063.06a yuvaṃ śrībhir darśatābhir ābhiḥ śubhe puṣṭim ūhathuḥ sūryāyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1328: RV_6,063.06c pra vāṃ vayo vapuṣe 'nu paptan nakṣad vāṇī suṣṭutā dhiṣṇyā vām ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1329: RV_6,063.07a ā vāṃ vayo 'śvāso vahiṣṭhā abhi prayo nāsatyā vahantu |
GV01rv_hn06u:1330: RV_6,063.07c pra vāṃ ratho manojavā asarjīṣaḥ pṛkṣa iṣidho anu pūrvīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1331: RV_6,063.08a puru hi vām purubhujā deṣṇaṃ dhenuṃ na iṣam pinvatam asakrām |
GV01rv_hn06u:1332: RV_6,063.08c stutaś ca vām mādhvī suṣṭutiś ca rasāś ca ye vām anu rātim agman ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1333: RV_6,063.09a uta ma ṛjre purayasya raghvī sumīḷhe śatam peruke ca pakvā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1334: RV_6,063.09c śāṇḍo dād dhiraṇinaḥ smaddiṣṭīn daśa vaśāso abhiṣāca ṛṣvān ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1335: RV_6,063.10a saṃ vāṃ śatā nāsatyā sahasrāśvānām purupanthā gire dāt |
GV01rv_hn06u:1336: RV_6,063.10c bharadvājāya vīra nū gire dād dhatā rakṣāṃsi purudaṃsasā syuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1337: RV_6,063.11a ā vāṃ sumne variman sūribhiḥ ṣyām ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1338: RV_6,064.01a ud u śriya uṣaso rocamānā asthur apāṃ normayo ruśantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1339: RV_6,064.01c kṛṇoti viśvā supathā sugāny abhūd u vasvī dakṣiṇā maghonī ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1340: RV_6,064.02a bhadrā dadṛkṣa urviyā vi bhāsy ut te śocir bhānavo dyām apaptan |
GV01rv_hn06u:1341: RV_6,064.02c āvir vakṣaḥ kṛṇuṣe śumbhamānoṣo devi rocamānā mahobhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1342: RV_6,064.03a vahanti sīm aruṇāso ruśanto gāvaḥ subhagām urviyā prathānām |
GV01rv_hn06u:1343: RV_6,064.03c apejate śūro asteva śatrūn bādhate tamo ajiro na voḷhā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1344: RV_6,064.04a sugota te supathā parvateṣv avāte apas tarasi svabhāno |
GV01rv_hn06u:1345: RV_6,064.04c sā na ā vaha pṛthuyāmann ṛṣve rayiṃ divo duhitar iṣayadhyai ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1346: RV_6,064.05a sā vaha yokṣabhir avātoṣo varaṃ vahasi joṣam anu |
GV01rv_hn06u:1347: RV_6,064.05c tvaṃ divo duhitar yā ha devī pūrvahūtau maṃhanā darśatā bhūḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1348: RV_6,064.06a ut te vayaś cid vasater apaptan naraś ca ye pitubhājo vyuṣṭau |
GV01rv_hn06u:1349: RV_6,064.06c amā sate vahasi bhūri vāmam uṣo devi dāśuṣe martyāya ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1350: RV_6,065.01a eṣā syā no duhitā divojāḥ kṣitīr ucchantī mānuṣīr ajīgaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1351: RV_6,065.01c yā bhānunā ruśatā rāmyāsv ajñāyi tiras tamasaś cid aktūn ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1352: RV_6,065.02a vi tad yayur aruṇayugbhir aśvaiś citram bhānty uṣasaś candrarathāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1353: RV_6,065.02c agraṃ yajñasya bṛhato nayantīr vi tā bādhante tama ūrmyāyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1354: RV_6,065.03a śravo vājam iṣam ūrjaṃ vahantīr ni dāśuṣa uṣaso martyāya |
GV01rv_hn06u:1355: RV_6,065.03c maghonīr vīravat patyamānā avo dhāta vidhate ratnam adya ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1356: RV_6,065.04a idā hi vo vidhate ratnam astīdā vīrāya dāśuṣa uṣāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1357: RV_6,065.04c idā viprāya jarate yad ukthā ni ṣma māvate vahathā purā cit ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1358: RV_6,065.05a idā hi ta uṣo adrisāno gotrā gavām aṅgiraso gṛṇanti |
GV01rv_hn06u:1359: RV_6,065.05c vy arkeṇa bibhidur brahmaṇā ca satyā nṛṇām abhavad devahūtiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1360: RV_6,065.06a ucchā divo duhitaḥ pratnavan no bharadvājavad vidhate maghoni |
GV01rv_hn06u:1361: RV_6,065.06c suvīraṃ rayiṃ gṛṇate rirīhy urugāyam adhi dhehi śravo naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1362: RV_6,066.01a vapur nu tac cikituṣe cid astu samānaṃ nāma dhenu patyamānam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1363: RV_6,066.01c marteṣv anyad dohase pīpāya sakṛc chukraṃ duduhe pṛśnir ūdhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1364: RV_6,066.02a ye agnayo na śośucann idhānā dvir yat trir maruto vāvṛdhanta |
GV01rv_hn06u:1365: RV_6,066.02c areṇavo hiraṇyayāsa eṣāṃ sākaṃ nṛmṇaiḥ pauṃsyebhiś ca bhūvan ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1366: RV_6,066.03a rudrasya ye mīḷhuṣaḥ santi putrā yāṃś co nu dādhṛvir bharadhyai |
GV01rv_hn06u:1367: RV_6,066.03c vide hi mātā maho mahī ṣā set pṛśniḥ subhve garbham ādhāt ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1368: RV_6,066.04a na ya īṣante januṣo 'yā nv antaḥ santo 'vadyāni punānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1369: RV_6,066.04c nir yad duhre śucayo 'nu joṣam anu śriyā tanvam ukṣamāṇāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1370: RV_6,066.05a makṣū na yeṣu dohase cid ayā ā nāma dhṛṣṇu mārutaṃ dadhānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1371: RV_6,066.05c na ye staunā ayāso mahnā nū cit sudānur ava yāsad ugrān ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1372: RV_6,066.06a ta id ugrāḥ śavasā dhṛṣṇuṣeṇā ubhe yujanta rodasī sumeke |
GV01rv_hn06u:1373: RV_6,066.06c adha smaiṣu rodasī svaśocir āmavatsu tasthau na rokaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1374: RV_6,066.07a aneno vo maruto yāmo astv anaśvaś cid yam ajaty arathīḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1375: RV_6,066.07c anavaso anabhīśū rajastūr vi rodasī pathyā yāti sādhan ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1376: RV_6,066.08a nāsya vartā na tarutā nv asti maruto yam avatha vājasātau |
GV01rv_hn06u:1377: RV_6,066.08c toke vā goṣu tanaye yam apsu sa vrajaṃ dartā pārye adha dyoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1378: RV_6,066.09a pra citram arkaṃ gṛṇate turāya mārutāya svatavase bharadhvam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1379: RV_6,066.09c ye sahāṃsi sahasā sahante rejate agne pṛthivī makhebhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1380: RV_6,066.10a tviṣīmanto adhvarasyeva didyut tṛṣucyavaso juhvo nāgneḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1381: RV_6,066.10c arcatrayo dhunayo na vīrā bhrājajjanmāno maruto adhṛṣṭāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1382: RV_6,066.11a taṃ vṛdhantam mārutam bhrājadṛṣṭiṃ rudrasya sūnuṃ havasā vivāse |
GV01rv_hn06u:1383: RV_6,066.11c divaḥ śardhāya śucayo manīṣā girayo nāpa ugrā aspṛdhran ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1384: RV_6,067.01a viśveṣāṃ vaḥ satāṃ jyeṣṭhatamā gīrbhir mitrāvaruṇā vāvṛdhadhyai |
GV01rv_hn06u:1385: RV_6,067.01c saṃ yā raśmeva yamatur yamiṣṭhā dvā janāṃ asamā bāhubhiḥ svaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1386: RV_6,067.02a iyam mad vām pra stṛṇīte manīṣopa priyā namasā barhir accha |
GV01rv_hn06u:1387: RV_6,067.02c yantaṃ no mitrāvaruṇāv adhṛṣṭaṃ chardir yad vāṃ varūthyaṃ sudānū ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1388: RV_6,067.03a ā yātam mitrāvaruṇā suśasty upa priyā namasā hūyamānā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1389: RV_6,067.03c saṃ yāv apnastho apaseva janāñ chrudhīyataś cid yatatho mahitvā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1390: RV_6,067.04a aśvā na yā vājinā pūtabandhū ṛtā yad garbham aditir bharadhyai |
GV01rv_hn06u:1391: RV_6,067.04c pra yā mahi mahāntā jāyamānā ghorā martāya ripave ni dīdhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1392: RV_6,067.05a viśve yad vām maṃhanā mandamānāḥ kṣatraṃ devāso adadhuḥ sajoṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1393: RV_6,067.05c pari yad bhūtho rodasī cid urvī santi spaśo adabdhāso amūrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1394: RV_6,067.06a tā hi kṣatraṃ dhārayethe anu dyūn dṛṃhethe sānum upamād iva dyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1395: RV_6,067.06c dṛḷho nakṣatra uta viśvadevo bhūmim ātān dyāṃ dhāsināyoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1396: RV_6,067.07a tā vigraṃ dhaithe jaṭharam pṛṇadhyā ā yat sadma sabhṛtayaḥ pṛṇanti |
GV01rv_hn06u:1397: RV_6,067.07c na mṛṣyante yuvatayo 'vātā vi yat payo viśvajinvā bharante ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1398: RV_6,067.08a tā jihvayā sadam edaṃ sumedhā ā yad vāṃ satyo aratir ṛte bhūt |
GV01rv_hn06u:1399: RV_6,067.08c tad vām mahitvaṃ ghṛtānnāv astu yuvaṃ dāśuṣe vi cayiṣṭam aṃhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1400: RV_6,067.09a pra yad vām mitrāvaruṇā spūrdhan priyā dhāma yuvadhitā minanti |
GV01rv_hn06u:1401: RV_6,067.09c na ye devāsa ohasā na martā ayajñasāco apyo na putrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1402: RV_6,067.10a vi yad vācaṃ kīstāso bharante śaṃsanti ke cin nivido manānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1403: RV_6,067.10c ād vām bravāma satyāny ukthā nakir devebhir yatatho mahitvā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1404: RV_6,067.11a avor itthā vāṃ chardiṣo abhiṣṭau yuvor mitrāvaruṇāv askṛdhoyu |
GV01rv_hn06u:1405: RV_6,067.11c anu yad gāva sphurān ṛjipyaṃ dhṛṣṇuṃ yad raṇe vṛṣaṇaṃ yunajan ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1406: RV_6,068.01a śruṣṭī vāṃ yajña udyataḥ sajoṣā manuṣvad vṛktabarhiṣo yajadhyai |
GV01rv_hn06u:1407: RV_6,068.01c ā ya indrāvaruṇāv iṣe adya mahe sumnāya maha āvavartat ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1408: RV_6,068.02a tā hi śreṣṭhā devatātā tujā śūrāṇāṃ śaviṣṭhā tā hi bhūtam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1409: RV_6,068.02c maghonām maṃhiṣṭhā tuviśuṣma ṛtena vṛtraturā sarvasenā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1410: RV_6,068.03a tā gṛṇīhi namasyebhiḥ śūṣaiḥ sumnebhir indrāvaruṇā cakānā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1411: RV_6,068.03c vajreṇānyaḥ śavasā hanti vṛtraṃ siṣakty anyo vṛjaneṣu vipraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1412: RV_6,068.04a gnāś ca yan naraś ca vāvṛdhanta viśve devāso narāṃ svagūrtāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1413: RV_6,068.04c praibhya indrāvaruṇā mahitvā dyauś ca pṛthivi bhūtam urvī ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1414: RV_6,068.05a sa it sudānuḥ svavāṃ ṛtāvendrā yo vāṃ varuṇa dāśati tman |
GV01rv_hn06u:1415: RV_6,068.05c iṣā sa dviṣas tared dāsvān vaṃsad rayiṃ rayivataś ca janān ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1416: RV_6,068.06a yaṃ yuvaṃ dāśvadhvarāya devā rayiṃ dhattho vasumantam purukṣum |
GV01rv_hn06u:1417: RV_6,068.06c asme sa indrāvaruṇāv api ṣyāt pra yo bhanakti vanuṣām aśastīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1418: RV_6,068.07a uta naḥ sutrātro devagopāḥ sūribhya indrāvaruṇā rayiḥ ṣyāt |
GV01rv_hn06u:1419: RV_6,068.07c yeṣāṃ śuṣmaḥ pṛtanāsu sāhvān pra sadyo dyumnā tirate taturiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1420: RV_6,068.08a nū na indrāvaruṇā gṛṇānā pṛṅktaṃ rayiṃ sauśravasāya devā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1421: RV_6,068.08c itthā gṛṇanto mahinasya śardho 'po na nāvā duritā tarema ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1422: RV_6,068.09a pra samrāje bṛhate manma nu priyam arca devāya varuṇāya saprathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1423: RV_6,068.09c ayaṃ ya urvī mahinā mahivrataḥ kratvā vibhāty ajaro na śociṣā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1424: RV_6,068.10a indrāvaruṇā sutapāv imaṃ sutaṃ somam pibatam madyaṃ dhṛtavratā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1425: RV_6,068.10c yuvo ratho adhvaraṃ devavītaye prati svasaram upa yāti pītaye ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1426: RV_6,068.11a indrāvaruṇā madhumattamasya vṛṣṇaḥ somasya vṛṣaṇā vṛṣethām |
GV01rv_hn06u:1427: RV_6,068.11c idaṃ vām andhaḥ pariṣiktam asme āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayethām ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1428: RV_6,069.01a saṃ vāṃ karmaṇā sam iṣā hinomīndrāviṣṇū apasas pāre asya |
GV01rv_hn06u:1429: RV_6,069.01c juṣethāṃ yajñaṃ draviṇaṃ ca dhattam ariṣṭair naḥ pathibhiḥ pārayantā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1430: RV_6,069.02a yā viśvāsāṃ janitārā matīnām indrāviṣṇū kalaśā somadhānā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1431: RV_6,069.02c pra vāṃ giraḥ śasyamānā avantu pra stomāso gīyamānāso arkaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1432: RV_6,069.03a indrāviṣṇū madapatī madānām ā somaṃ yātaṃ draviṇo dadhānā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1433: RV_6,069.03c saṃ vām añjantv aktubhir matīnāṃ saṃ stomāsaḥ śasyamānāsa ukthaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1434: RV_6,069.04a ā vām aśvāso abhimātiṣāha indrāviṣṇū sadhamādo vahantu |
GV01rv_hn06u:1435: RV_6,069.04c juṣethāṃ viśvā havanā matīnām upa brahmāṇi śṛṇutaṃ giro me ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1436: RV_6,069.05a indrāviṣṇū tat panayāyyaṃ vāṃ somasya mada uru cakramāthe |
GV01rv_hn06u:1437: RV_6,069.05c akṛṇutam antarikṣaṃ varīyo 'prathataṃ jīvase no rajāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1438: RV_6,069.06a indrāviṣṇū haviṣā vāvṛdhānāgrādvānā namasā rātahavyā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1439: RV_6,069.06c ghṛtāsutī draviṇaṃ dhattam asme samudra sthaḥ kalaśaḥ somadhānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1440: RV_6,069.07a indrāviṣṇū pibatam madhvo asya somasya dasrā jaṭharam pṛṇethām |
GV01rv_hn06u:1441: RV_6,069.07c ā vām andhāṃsi madirāṇy agmann upa brahmāṇi śṛṇutaṃ havam me ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1442: RV_6,069.08a ubhā jigyathur na parā jayethe na parā jigye kataraś canainoḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1443: RV_6,069.08c indraś ca viṣṇo yad apaspṛdhethāṃ tredhā sahasraṃ vi tad airayethām ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1444: RV_6,070.01a ghṛtavatī bhuvanānām abhiśriyorvī pṛthvī madhudughe supeśasā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1445: RV_6,070.01c dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇasya dharmaṇā viṣkabhite ajare bhūriretasā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1446: RV_6,070.02a asaścantī bhūridhāre payasvatī ghṛtaṃ duhāte sukṛte śucivrate |
GV01rv_hn06u:1447: RV_6,070.02c rājantī asya bhuvanasya rodasī asme retaḥ siñcataṃ yan manurhitam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1448: RV_6,070.03a yo vām ṛjave kramaṇāya rodasī marto dadāśa dhiṣaṇe sa sādhati |
GV01rv_hn06u:1449: RV_6,070.03c pra prajābhir jāyate dharmaṇas pari yuvoḥ siktā viṣurūpāṇi savratā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1450: RV_6,070.04a ghṛtena dyāvāpṛthivī abhīvṛte ghṛtaśriyā ghṛtapṛcā ghṛtāvṛdhā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1451: RV_6,070.04c urvī pṛthvī hotṛvūrye purohite te id viprā īḷate sumnam iṣṭaye ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1452: RV_6,070.05a madhu no dyāvāpṛthivī mimikṣatām madhuścutā madhudughe madhuvrate |
GV01rv_hn06u:1453: RV_6,070.05c dadhāne yajñaṃ draviṇaṃ ca devatā mahi śravo vājam asme suvīryam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1454: RV_6,070.06a ūrjaṃ no dyauś ca pṛthivī ca pinvatām pitā mātā viśvavidā sudaṃsasā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1455: RV_6,070.06c saṃrarāṇe rodasī viśvaśambhuvā saniṃ vājaṃ rayim asme sam invatām ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1456: RV_6,071.01a ud u ṣya devaḥ savitā hiraṇyayā bāhū ayaṃsta savanāya sukratuḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1457: RV_6,071.01c ghṛtena pāṇī abhi pruṣṇute makho yuvā sudakṣo rajaso vidharmaṇi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1458: RV_6,071.02a devasya vayaṃ savituḥ savīmani śreṣṭhe syāma vasunaś ca dāvane |
GV01rv_hn06u:1459: RV_6,071.02c yo viśvasya dvipado yaś catuṣpado niveśane prasave cāsi bhūmanaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1460: RV_6,071.03a adabdhebhiḥ savitaḥ pāyubhiṣ ṭvaṃ śivebhir adya pari pāhi no gayam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1461: RV_6,071.03c hiraṇyajihvaḥ suvitāya navyase rakṣā mākir no aghaśaṃsa īśata ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1462: RV_6,071.04a ud u ṣya devaḥ savitā damūnā hiraṇyapāṇiḥ pratidoṣam asthāt |
GV01rv_hn06u:1463: RV_6,071.04c ayohanur yajato mandrajihva ā dāśuṣe suvati bhūri vāmam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1464: RV_6,071.05a ud ū ayāṃ upavakteva bāhū hiraṇyayā savitā supratīkā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1465: RV_6,071.05c divo rohāṃsy aruhat pṛthivyā arīramat patayat kac cid abhvam ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1466: RV_6,071.06a vāmam adya savitar vāmam u śvo dive-dive vāmam asmabhyaṃ sāvīḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1467: RV_6,071.06c vāmasya hi kṣayasya deva bhūrer ayā dhiyā vāmabhājaḥ syāma ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1468: RV_6,072.01a indrāsomā mahi tad vām mahitvaṃ yuvam mahāni prathamāni cakrathuḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1469: RV_6,072.01c yuvaṃ sūryaṃ vividathur yuvaṃ svar viśvā tamāṃsy ahataṃ nidaś ca ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1470: RV_6,072.02a indrāsomā vāsayatha uṣāsam ut sūryaṃ nayatho jyotiṣā saha |
GV01rv_hn06u:1471: RV_6,072.02c upa dyāṃ skambhathu skambhanenāprathatam pṛthivīm mātaraṃ vi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1472: RV_6,072.03a indrāsomāv ahim apaḥ pariṣṭhāṃ hatho vṛtram anu vāṃ dyaur amanyata |
GV01rv_hn06u:1473: RV_6,072.03c prārṇāṃsy airayataṃ nadīnām ā samudrāṇi paprathuḥ purūṇi ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1474: RV_6,072.04a indrāsomā pakvam āmāsv antar ni gavām id dadhathur vakṣaṇāsu |
GV01rv_hn06u:1475: RV_6,072.04c jagṛbhathur anapinaddham āsu ruśac citrāsu jagatīṣv antaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1476: RV_6,072.05a indrāsomā yuvam aṅga tarutram apatyasācaṃ śrutyaṃ rarāthe |
GV01rv_hn06u:1477: RV_6,072.05c yuvaṃ śuṣmaṃ naryaṃ carṣaṇibhyaḥ saṃ vivyathuḥ pṛtanāṣāham ugrā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1478: RV_6,073.01a yo adribhit prathamajā ṛtāvā bṛhaspatir āṅgiraso haviṣmān |
GV01rv_hn06u:1479: RV_6,073.01c dvibarhajmā prāgharmasat pitā na ā rodasī vṛṣabho roravīti ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1480: RV_6,073.02a janāya cid ya īvata u lokam bṛhaspatir devahūtau cakāra |
GV01rv_hn06u:1481: RV_6,073.02c ghnan vṛtrāṇi vi puro dardarīti jayañ chatrūṃr amitrān pṛtsu sāhan ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1482: RV_6,073.03a bṛhaspatiḥ sam ajayad vasūni maho vrajān gomato deva eṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1483: RV_6,073.03c apaḥ siṣāsan svar apratīto bṛhaspatir hanty amitram arkaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1484: RV_6,074.01a somārudrā dhārayethām asuryam pra vām iṣṭayo 'ram aśnuvantu |
GV01rv_hn06u:1485: RV_6,074.01c dame-dame sapta ratnā dadhānā śaṃ no bhūtaṃ dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1486: RV_6,074.02a somārudrā vi vṛhataṃ viṣūcīm amīvā yā no gayam āviveśa |
GV01rv_hn06u:1487: RV_6,074.02c āre bādhethāṃ nirṛtim parācair asme bhadrā sauśravasāni santu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1488: RV_6,074.03a somārudrā yuvam etāny asme viśvā tanūṣu bheṣajāni dhattam |
GV01rv_hn06u:1489: RV_6,074.03c ava syatam muñcataṃ yan no asti tanūṣu baddhaṃ kṛtam eno asmat ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1490: RV_6,074.04a tigmāyudhau tigmahetī suśevau somārudrāv iha su mṛḷataṃ naḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1491: RV_6,074.04c pra no muñcataṃ varuṇasya pāśād gopāyataṃ naḥ sumanasyamānā ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1492: RV_6,075.01a jīmūtasyeva bhavati pratīkaṃ yad varmī yāti samadām upasthe |
GV01rv_hn06u:1493: RV_6,075.01c anāviddhayā tanvā jaya tvaṃ sa tvā varmaṇo mahimā pipartu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1494: RV_6,075.02a dhanvanā gā dhanvanājiṃ jayema dhanvanā tīvrāḥ samado jayema |
GV01rv_hn06u:1495: RV_6,075.02c dhanuḥ śatror apakāmaṃ kṛṇoti dhanvanā sarvāḥ pradiśo jayema ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1496: RV_6,075.03a vakṣyantīved ā ganīganti karṇam priyaṃ sakhāyam pariṣasvajānā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1497: RV_6,075.03c yoṣeva śiṅkte vitatādhi dhanvañ jyā iyaṃ samane pārayantī ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1498: RV_6,075.04a te ācarantī samaneva yoṣā māteva putram bibhṛtām upasthe |
GV01rv_hn06u:1499: RV_6,075.04c apa śatrūn vidhyatāṃ saṃvidāne ārtnī ime viṣphurantī amitrān ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1500: RV_6,075.05a bahvīnām pitā bahur asya putraś ciścā kṛṇoti samanāvagatya |
GV01rv_hn06u:1501: RV_6,075.05c iṣudhiḥ saṅkāḥ pṛtanāś ca sarvāḥ pṛṣṭhe ninaddho jayati prasūtaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1502: RV_6,075.06a rathe tiṣṭhan nayati vājinaḥ puro yatra-yatra kāmayate suṣārathiḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1503: RV_6,075.06c abhīśūnām mahimānam panāyata manaḥ paścād anu yacchanti raśmayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1504: RV_6,075.07a tīvrān ghoṣān kṛṇvate vṛṣapāṇayo 'śvā rathebhiḥ saha vājayantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1505: RV_6,075.07c avakrāmantaḥ prapadair amitrān kṣiṇanti śatrūṃr anapavyayantaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1506: RV_6,075.08a rathavāhanaṃ havir asya nāma yatrāyudhaṃ nihitam asya varma |
GV01rv_hn06u:1507: RV_6,075.08c tatrā ratham upa śagmaṃ sadema viśvāhā vayaṃ sumanasyamānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1508: RV_6,075.09a svāduṣaṃsadaḥ pitaro vayodhāḥ kṛcchreśritaḥ śaktīvanto gabhīrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1509: RV_6,075.09c citrasenā iṣubalā amṛdhrāḥ satovīrā uravo vrātasāhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1510: RV_6,075.10a brāhmaṇāsaḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ śive no dyāvāpṛthivī anehasā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1511: RV_6,075.10c pūṣā naḥ pātu duritād ṛtāvṛdho rakṣā mākir no aghaśaṃsa īśata ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1512: RV_6,075.11a suparṇaṃ vaste mṛgo asyā danto gobhiḥ saṃnaddhā patati prasūtā |
GV01rv_hn06u:1513: RV_6,075.11c yatrā naraḥ saṃ ca vi ca dravanti tatrāsmabhyam iṣavaḥ śarma yaṃsan ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1514: RV_6,075.12a ṛjīte pari vṛṅdhi no 'śmā bhavatu nas tanūḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1515: RV_6,075.12c somo adhi bravītu no 'ditiḥ śarma yacchatu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1516: RV_6,075.13a ā jaṅghanti sānv eṣāṃ jaghanāṃ upa jighnate |
GV01rv_hn06u:1518: RV_6,075.14a ahir iva bhogaiḥ pary eti bāhuṃ jyāyā hetim paribādhamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn06u:1519: RV_6,075.14c hastaghno viśvā vayunāni vidvān pumān pumāṃsam pari pātu viśvataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1520: RV_6,075.15a ālāktā yā ruruśīrṣṇy atho yasyā ayo mukham |
GV01rv_hn06u:1521: RV_6,075.15c idam parjanyaretasa iṣvai devyai bṛhan namaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1522: RV_6,075.16a avasṛṣṭā parā pata śaravye brahmasaṃśite |
GV01rv_hn06u:1523: RV_6,075.16c gacchāmitrān pra padyasva māmīṣāṃ kaṃ canoc chiṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1524: RV_6,075.17a yatra bāṇāḥ sampatanti kumārā viśikhā iva |
GV01rv_hn06u:1525: RV_6,075.17c tatrā no brahmaṇas patir aditiḥ śarma yacchatu viśvāhā śarma yacchatu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1526: RV_6,075.18a marmāṇi te varmaṇā chādayāmi somas tvā rājāmṛtenānu vastām |
GV01rv_hn06u:1527: RV_6,075.18c uror varīyo varuṇas te kṛṇotu jayantaṃ tvānu devā madantu ||
GV01rv_hn06u:1528: RV_6,075.19a yo naḥ svo araṇo yaś ca niṣṭyo jighāṃsati |
GV01rv_hn06u:1529: RV_6,075.19c devās taṃ sarve dhūrvantu brahma varma mamāntaram ||
